NOTE: In order to claim a perk, make sure to click on the perk listed to the right-hand side of the page.


Short Summary

We hope to raise $1500 in order to learn how to better fund the literary outreach programs of the University of North Carolina Wilmington MFA program. Some of these commitments include our work with students of all ages and backgrounds through Writers in Action, Teens Out Loud and the Summer Young Writers’ workshop. We seek to help our North Carolina graduate students further engage with the whole of the literary community through national conference involvement and by bolstering our reading series. In this way, we aspire to better bridge the gap between our program, local individuals in Wilmington, and the greater literary collective.

We hope, through this funding, to make a difference for young writers, and also for Wilmington’s artistry at large. With these funds we strive to foster passion for writing in youth, especially as younger students read and write less for pleasure. With your help, we believe we can assist in cultivating that passion. 


What We Need & What You Get

Our Goal

We’re looking to raise a minimum of $1500 so that we can provide at least one $500 scholarship to an at-need high-school student to attend the Young Writers’ Workshop, $1000 for our students to attend the national Association of Writers and Writing Programs conference (AWP), and any additional funding allocated to funding a second (or third!) young writer if possible, and then AWP.  

We also hope to engage more in our local and national writing community by growing our current reading series and sending our graduate students to the national AWP conference. At AWP, students are able to interact with the larger literary experience, connecting our individual involvements with those of the world around us. At AWP, we are able to broaden our literary experience, fostering connections between our community and other writing professionals from all over the country. We believe that AWP is the place where the newest ideas in writing and literature are explored, where writers from all walks of life are able to come together to grapple with today’s most pressing issues.

We hope to further develop our current reading series as a platform for our students and the public to come together around literature. We want to enlarge the scope of these readings and explore how other programs have gotten their communities involved.

Further, we aim to research effective techniques to develop our Teens Out Loud program in which graduate students work with HIV-positive teens. Right now, the program is relatively small and we’d like to better train our mentors to help give marginalized individuals the opportunity to better express their experiences. 

Finally, we seek to further develop our involvement with Writers in Action. We think that it is so important and rare for students (and teachers) to get a break from test-based culture and instead place greater focus on independent, creative thinking. With Writers in Action, graduate students volunteer to teach creative writing weekly in local elementary, junior, and high schools, fostering the love of reading and writing from a young age.

Perks

Our perks are unique to the UNCW creative writing department—if you’re an aspiring or established writer, you have the opportunity to have your fiction, creative nonfiction, or poetry receive personal feedback from a UNCW graduate student or one of UNCW’s esteemed professors—Philip Gerard, Malena Morling, Mark Cox, or Clyde Edgerton.

In addition to limited-edition broadsides, literary bumper stickers and t-shirts, you can receive editor-signed copies of the literary journals Ecotone and Chautauqua, as well as signed copies of books from our faculty members—including rare and first edition works.

If you’re really looking to make a difference for a Young Writer, you have the opportunity for a scholarship to be created in your name and receive a personalized note about what the experience meant from the student you help to attend the Summer Young Writers’ workshop—the first chance many of these students have to explore their writing lives in a tangible way. 

Allotment

If we don’t reach our entire goal, we will first fund one student to attend the Young Writers’ Workshop. The remaining funds will go to AWP unless we can (hopefully!) fund additional scholarships for the workshops. Any donation under the tier of funding a student will go directly to a student! We promise to fund one student even if no scholarship tiers are donated (which means that our first $500 goes directly to a young writer).


The Impact

Our Indiegogo campaign two years ago exceeded our own expectation. With the generous donations, we were able to facilitate the attendance of a few Young Writers who were unable to attend on their own. We were also fortunate enough to partially fund a group of representative students to AWP, where the students not only modeled our ideals as writers, but further engaged similar literary communities who shared with us their own outreach methodologies. This opportunity also gave our students a platform to further their careers, by meeting with fellow writers, editors, and agents, all of whom came together under the devotion to literature.

Though this experience, we have been able to broaden our outreach over these past two years, and we hope to accomplish even more. By helping fund our campaign, we believe that we will be able to help perpetuate the love of reading and writing in our communities.


Risks & Challenges

At this point in our experience, we have a strong foundation with our past work, and we don’t want to risk the loss of what we've already built. Without your help, our biggest uncertainty is our inability to help a young writer pursue his or her passion for writing.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you’d like to contribute, but you just don’t have the funds to help out, we’d appreciate anything you can do to Share the Word—whether on Facebook, Twitter, your own blog, or through an email to a literature-loving friend. Every contribution, even the smallest, will help us work toward our goal of outreach in our North Carolina community.

story:
The Book

Today there are an endless variety of teachings, techniques, and practices promising spiritual awakening to help us live happier, more fulfilled lives. While this is great, it can also be confusing. On what basis do we know how to choose what serves us? Without a unifying center, how does it all hang together? We want to walk our own path, but we also want to make sure we are going somewhere worthwhile. Our awakening is just the start of a road that no one before us has traveled.

The Tapestry of Being is far more than a collection of exercises, techniques, and practices. It is a way to hold the mutually contradictory spiritual teachings of the world in a universal holistic context. This vision is for someone who wants to trust the authority within themselves while still fruitfully, and respectfully, approaching past traditions and systems. It's about relating to teachings and teachers that you meet in such a way that honors what they offer without limiting you.

THE TAPESTRY OF BEING is the first book of a planned series of four, subtitled Talks on Practical Mysticism. These teachings convey a way of relating to the mystery of existence that is broad-minded, paradoxical, and intensely in­dividual. For those who may be looking for a non-sectarian template that you can use on your own or with oth­ers, this is an inclusive non-dual orientation that shows you ways to contact your inner guidance and develop in six essential dimensions.

This started as tele-course in 2013. After years of developing the teachings, and testing the materials with students, adding and rewriting, I finished the first draft in 2017 and continued with editing throughout 2018.

I'm excited to begin to share this perspective with the larger world and consider this book the start of something that will bridge both individuals and cultures on this ever-smaller planet.

If you'd like to directly donate please click the fuchsia "Back It" button to the right of the above video.

And there are plenty of thank you gifts ("perks") to choose from.

The Budget

The budget for this Indigogo goes toward transcriptions, publication, distribution and promotion costs for this book.  It will also go toward the building of a quality website (http://www.Tapestryofbeing.org/) for this and the future books advancing the Tapestry of Being vision of devotion, embodiment, and relationship.

The plan is that the book will be ready to ship just after the campaign has ended on June 19.  The books and all perks will be sent out then.
When you self-publish, you are not just the author; you are the publicist, the advertiser, and the promoter. This is a big undertaking, and I welcome all the support I can get. So many friends through the years have helped me in uncovering this understanding, and I hope you'll come along on this journey with me!

The Perks

$10: A signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark, and a THANK YOU.

$20: A Paperback of The Tapestry of Being and a signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark.

$40: Tapestry Inquiry Guided Meditations: These are six meditations, one on each of the Tapestry of Being Nodes. Each meditation session builds on the one before it. There is a total of 3 hours worth of downloadable digital audio material from a course entitled “Tapestry Inquiry.” A paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark. These are a great audio companion to the book.

$60: An (hour long) personal zoom session on any topic or questions coming from the book or anything else you’d like to explore.  A paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark. The session is redeemable for up to a year after receiving the book.

$80: Two (hour long) personal zoom sessions on any topic or questions coming from the book or anything else you’d like to explore. A paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark. The sessions are redeemable for up to a year after receiving the book.

$100: An Audio Download Course (each course itself is a $150 value) based on the Tapestry of Being teachings, A paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed bookmark.
This is a download set of one of the three 7 class telecourses for a total of nine hours of teaching.
Choose one of these three courses:
1) Living Your Divinity
An experiential journey into the world of deepening peace and expanded awareness. For a full description of this course: https://tapestry-of-being.myshopify.com/product...
2) Descent into Love
An experiential adventure into what it means to embody spiritual realization into our ordinary human life and relationships. For a full description of this course: https://tapestry-of-being.myshopify.com/product...
3) The Lover’s Heartbeat
From the moment we completed the first Tapestry of Being Tele-course people have expressed a desire to delve further into the dimensions of Spiritual Worship, Deities and Angelic Presences. For a full description of this course: https://tapestry-of-being.myshopify.com/product...

$250: All 3 Audio Download Courses (itself a $450 value), Tapestry Inquiry Guided Meditations, a paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed bookmark.
Go here for a full description of all of 3 of these 9-hour courses: http://krishnasatsang.com/telecourses.html

INTERNATIONAL SUPPORTERS: Because of how expensive overseas shipping can be, please note that there will be an additional cost for international shipping of books. Shipping is included in all US orders.

The Author

My name is Krishna Gauci; I was brought up in the projects of the Bronx, and the suburbs of New Jersey. I’ve worked as a cab driver, an auto assembly line worker, a cabinetmaker, and a city bus driver. In 1992, after more than a decade of meditating and working with various spiritual teachers, I came across the teacher HWL Poonja, who was one of the last living disciples of the great Indian sage Sri Ramana Maharshi. My times spent with Poonjaji were the most potent and clarifying encounters I ever had. He was at once an intensely devout man in the Hindu Bhakti Devotional tradition as well as being a staunch proponent of non-dual Advaita Teachings. My experience of myself and the nature of reality was changed forever in the presence of Poonja. With him, there was an awakening recognition of Consciousness as being what I always already am.

After Poonja’s passing, I found myself attracted to a community of spiritual teachers who were actively bringing non-dual teachings into a more relational, embodied, emotional and practical sphere. In association with what later became the Trillium Awakening community, I found myself developing in ways that I did not expect: with my identity as an all-pervading energetic presence awakened into life itself. I then became a teacher and spiritual counselor as part of an alliance of like-minded teachers, assisting people in awakened living. I’ve worked with hundreds of people in both retreat settings and individual consulting sessions. My approach is down to earth and practical, even as it points to the highest transcendence.

Risks & Challenges

As with any crowdfunding, there can always be unforeseen difficulties with timeline, shipping, and other things. However, because "The Tapestry of Being" as a book is entirely written, has gone through many edits, and has gone through many readings, I don't foresee any significant changes to it and feel confident in my timeline for its release. I also believe I've given myself enough time to order, and ship all the perks in a timely manner so I find any issues with that to be near non-existent.
Of course, I know there is always a chance the project won't be fully funded. If that is the case, the project will not be abandoned, and will continue on.
I deeply believe in this vision and I think it would be great for other people to be excited about it too. I fully intend to move forward with it and supporters will still receive their rewards no matter what!

For those who may be looking for a non-sectarian template that you can use on your own or with oth­ers, this is an inclusive non-dual orientation that shows you ways to contact your inner guidance and develop in six essential dimensions.
This started as tele-course in 2013. After years of developing the teachings, and testing the materials with students, adding and rewriting, I finished the first draft in 2017 and continued with editing throughout 2018.
I'm excited to begin to share this perspective with the larger world and consider this book the start of something that will bridge both individuals and cultures on this ever-smaller planet.
If you'd like to directly donate please click the fuchsia "Back It" button to the right of the above video.
And there are plenty of thank you gifts ("perks") to choose from.
The Budget
The budget for this Indigogo goes toward transcriptions, publication, distribution and promotion costs for this book.  It will also go toward the building of a quality website (http://www.Tapestryofbeing.org/) for this and the future books advancing the Tapestry of Being vision of devotion, embodiment, and relationship.
The plan is that the book will be ready to ship just after the campaign has ended on June 19.  The books and all perks will be sent out then.When you self-publish, you are not just the author; you are the publicist, the advertiser, and the promoter. This is a big undertaking, and I welcome all the support I can get. So many friends through the years have helped me in uncovering this understanding, and I hope you'll come along on this journey with me!
The Perks
$10: A signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark, and a THANK YOU.
$20: A Paperback of The Tapestry of Being and a signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark.
$40: Tapestry Inquiry Guided Meditations: These are six meditations, one on each of the Tapestry of Being Nodes. Each meditation session builds on the one before it. There is a total of 3 hours worth of downloadable digital audio material from a course entitled “Tapestry Inquiry.” A paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark. These are a great audio companion to the book.
$60: An (hour long) personal zoom session on any topic or questions coming from the book or anything else you’d like to explore.  A paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark. The session is redeemable for up to a year after receiving the book.
$80: Two (hour long) personal zoom sessions on any topic or questions coming from the book or anything else you’d like to explore. A paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed Tapestry of Being Bookmark. The sessions are redeemable for up to a year after receiving the book.
$100: An Audio Download Course (each course itself is a $150 value) based on the Tapestry of Being teachings, A paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed bookmark.This is a download set of one of the three 7 class telecourses for a total of nine hours of teaching.Choose one of these three courses:1) Living Your DivinityAn experiential journey into the world of deepening peace and expanded awareness. For a full description of this course: https://tapestry-of-being.myshopify.com/product...2) Descent into LoveAn experiential adventure into what it means to embody spiritual realization into our ordinary human life and relationships. For a full description of this course: https://tapestry-of-being.myshopify.com/product...3) The Lover’s HeartbeatFrom the moment we completed the first Tapestry of Being Tele-course people have expressed a desire to delve further into the dimensions of Spiritual Worship, Deities and Angelic Presences. For a full description of this course: https://tapestry-of-being.myshopify.com/product...
$250: All 3 Audio Download Courses (itself a $450 value), Tapestry Inquiry Guided Meditations, a paperback of The Tapestry of Being, and a signed bookmark.Go here for a full description of all of 3 of these 9-hour courses: http://krishnasatsang.com/telecourses.html
INTERNATIONAL SUPPORTERS: Because of how expensive overseas shipping can be, please note that there will be an additional cost for international shipping of books. Shipping is included in all US orders.

The Author

My name is Krishna Gauci; I was brought up in the projects of the Bronx, and the suburbs of New Jersey. I’ve worked as a cab driver, an auto assembly line worker, a cabinetmaker, and a city bus driver. In 1992, after more than a decade of meditating and working with various spiritual teachers, I came across the teacher HWL Poonja, who was one of the last living disciples of the great Indian sage Sri Ramana Maharshi. My times spent with Poonjaji were the most potent and clarifying encounters I ever had. He was at once an intensely devout man in the Hindu Bhakti Devotional tradition as well as being a staunch proponent of non-dual Advaita Teachings. My experience of myself and the nature of reality was changed forever in the presence of Poonja. With him, there was an awakening recognition of Consciousness as being what I always already am.
After Poonja’s passing, I found myself attracted to a community of spiritual teachers who were actively bringing non-dual teachings into a more relational, embodied, emotional and practical sphere. In association with what later became the Trillium Awakening community, I found myself developing in ways that I did not expect: with my identity as an all-pervading energetic presence awakened into life itself. I then became a teacher and spiritual counselor as part of an alliance of like-minded teachers, assisting people in awakened living. I’ve worked with hundreds of people in both retreat settings and individual consulting sessions. My approach is down to earth and practical, even as it points to the highest transcendence.
Risks & Challenges
As with any crowdfunding, there can always be unforeseen difficulties with timeline, shipping, and other things. However, because "The Tapestry of Being" as a book is entirely written, has gone through many edits, and has gone through many readings, I don't foresee any significant changes to it and feel confident in my timeline for its release. I also believe I've given myself enough time to order, and ship all the perks in a timely manner so I find any issues with that to be near non-existent.Of course, I know there is always a chance the project won't be fully funded. If that is the case, the project will not be abandoned, and will continue on.I deeply believe in this vision and I think it would be great for other people to be excited about it too. I fully intend to move forward with it and supporters will still receive their rewards no matter what!

story:
Story of My Book

Chronic: Daring to go Beyond is a collection of stories of women with chronic illnesses and/or disabilities who have succeeded regardless of the stigma. In the book, we take a closer look at the secrets that made us succeed and how you can apply them in your own life.

My name is Nicole M. Pagán-Aponte, and I am the author of Chronic: Daring to go Beyond. I wrote this book because I wanted to show you all the things we learned in our rocky journey and how daring to adapt made us succeed. Whether you have been recently diagnosed with an illness, living with one all your life, or are just beginning your path toward your goal, you can apply these teachings and reach success.

Anyone can use the tools that we developed. The truth is, illness is just a very concrete representation of the challenges we all may face on the way to our dreams.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that success may not be a linear road, but your dreams are attainable. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for ending the stigma around chronic illness, mental illness, and disability. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you reach success through the principles of mental adaptation.

In this book, you'll learn about resilience and empowerment through vulnerability. You'll hear stories such as:

  • Embracing creativity
  • Taking your power
  • Owning your story

You will love this book if you believe in the importance of diversity and inclusion, enjoy making a deep connection with others, and love a good underdog story.

Chronic: Daring to go Beyond speaks to young professionals and chronically ill or disabled individuals who want to look at success and vulnerability in a new way.

The Book - Chronic: Daring to go beyond

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapter 2-3. We will begin explaining how we got here. When we started this journey we all faced a similar issue, people around us believed we should settle. Maybe you've faced this as well. The pain and shame of people not believing in you. Learn the story of how me and Carolyn Casey, founder of Valuable 500, were startled by our diagnosis and how we were faced with a choice that would change our whole outlook on life.

Part 2 contains chapters 4-9. Here we will dive into the principles of mental adaptation. These are the concrete secrets to success that you can apply in your life to foster your own resilience. Learn how innovators Elizabeth Tikoyan, founder of Riley, Hannah Olson, founder of Chronically Capable, and Tiffany Yu, founder of Diversability, created their empires that are making a difference today.


Part 3 contains chapters 10-11. These are the closing chapters were we will reflect on where we stand today. Alongside Dr. Katherine Breward, an associate professor at the University of Winnipeg, who specializes in human resource management with a particular focus on diversity programming and combating non-conscious prejudice, we will discuss the things we can do to make sure everyone has a chance of succeeding through fostering inclusion and unlearning unconscious bias.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a translated edition. I have partnered with Diversability to use some of the money raised to continue furthering their mission, amplifying Disability voices.
 
  • I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • You will be receiving custom book stickers from Alyssa Silva and Creando Sentido
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author

Nicole M. Pagán-Aponte is a recovering people pleaser. Back in 2013 during her freshman year of Chemical Engineering, she was diagnosed with Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD), depression, and IBS. Following her diagnosis many people told her she wouldn’t make it as an engineer. Fast forward to today, she is a Harvard Business School SVMP Alumni and Forbes Under 30 Scholar. In 2020, she graduated with honors from the University of PR in Mayagüez with a bachelor's in chemical engineering and a minor in pharmaceutical engineering. Following that, she got her dream job as an engineer at a Fortune 500 company and co-founded a non-profit called LeadUp, a mentoring network helping young professionals in Puerto Rico with their career paths.

Her mission: to make people around her to reach their highest potential. She believes that for that we must #EndtheStigma around mental health. Once she embraced her illness, she began to meet amazing women with incredibly powerful stories. She hopes to share their stories both to help young women like her who are coming to terms with their diagnosis and to highlight how your dreams don't end with your illness.

Nicole is an animal lover. On her tiny farm, she houses a bunny, 2 sheep, 3 cats, 3 dogs, and 14 ducks. (And counting…)

She loves to help so feel free to reach her if you are interested in:

  • Understanding the experience of dealing with mental illness
  • If you want someone to talk to about your mental health
  • Tips and tricks to work with your own anxiety
  • If you need free career mentoring and advice


For more information, you can connect with Nicole at nicolepagan.author@gmail.com and at

Twitter: https://twitter.com/NicoleMPagnApo1
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/nicole-pagan-aponte
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nicolepaganaponte

Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ChronicallyDaring and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Nicole

story:
My 4 yr old on his own nature, "wonder" walk

 

The Inspiration for Wonder Walk

 

My name is ILHAM (name is derived from Arabic, meaning Inspiration or Imagination ). And true to the Inspiration of my name, I wrote this rhyming picture book back in 2015, during one sunny afternoon, while my oldest child was napping after our own long 'wonder walk'. This was in our home city of Toronto, when we used to live in the Leaside area- a historic neighborhood known for being a "verdant" place with friendly neighbours. At that time, my son was still under a year old, so I used my imagination to see how a little boy would talk with his beloved parent. 

I have to say, my now- 4 year old talks a lot like Johnny does in Wonder Walk. I try to satisfy his endless curiosity to the best of my abilities, but I get stumped, just like Mommy does in this book. Anyone who has kids or is around them, will know what I am talking about :) 

Apart from children's book writing, I also blog about kids books me and my kids love & our travel experiences over at StoryMummy

My family & I love taking nature walks and hikes. That also inspired me to write a book on spending time together as a family during "wonder walks". This is in Stratford, ON

 

About the Illustrator: Kerry Bell

Kerry Bell is a Canadian who likes to draw silly things. That usually means unimpressed cats and dancing people. She studied animation at the renowned Emily Carr Institute in Vancouver, Canada. She now lives in Mississippi, USA, with her husband and two impressive cats. You can enjoy more of her work here

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • For a limited 20 day period, you have the ability to get multiple print copies and E-book copy of this book, along with limited edition perks such as specially-designed bookmarks, colouring sheets, digital downloads. I will also give Social Media shoutouts on both my Instagram & Twitter accounts
  • But Hurry! These extra perks will not be available once the book is out in wide release. 
  • The funds raised through the pre-sale will go towards the following: printing your advance copies, distribution globally to bookstore platforms, paid online and in-personal promotional opportunities, supporting the release through book tours and public readings. Also, the funds raised will go towards fulfilling your rewards & shipping them out to you. 
  • Should I not reach the entire goal, the funds raised will still be used to fulfill the rewards to all my campaign supporters.

 

The Impact

Many really good books never get published and read, as most publishing houses are on the small side and have limited publication lists. This is why your support today will also show that the hybrid model of publishing is here to stay, as it helps great work see wider publication which otherwise might have remained forgotten, on an aspiring writer's hard drive. 

 

Any Risks to Supporting this Campaign?

There is low risk to you in supporting this book project, as a completed digital version of the book has already been reviewed and finalized by my publisher. I have begun sending this digital version to book review publications such as Readers Favourite, Quill & Quire, Publishers Weekly, so that I can gather Editorial Reviews in time for my impending book release. 

This pre-sale campaign will assist in the publication journey through advance sales, reviews and getting 'the word out' of Wonder Walk. 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute at this time, it doesn't mean that you cannot still join in & help! Please share this pre-sale with your networks, by using Indiegogo's share tools. You can also follow me on Social Media: 

Instagram: @storymummy86

Facebook Authour Page: @ialam22

Twitter: @IlhamAl50397575

Blog: www.storymummy.com

story:
Thanks for your support. The campaign is over, but if you still want to contribute, use the Ask a Question link and I'll reach out.

 

Short Summary

Inez Stanton wants nothing more than to live her quiet life ferrying cargo around the galaxy. However, the space debris that just hit her rig has other plans. As she fights to keep the ship running long enough to get help, her past seems to be along for the ride. Between the totalitarian regime controlling this part of the galaxy, mysterious shipwrecks, and living cargo, the stakes are way higher than Inez is looking for.

I'm JS Carter Gilson, and I've written this novella (and am writing more) featuring Inez. She's one of my favorite characters that I've created, and I want to give her the best chance to shine.

Check out the first scene in Update #1!

What We Need & What You Get

What I need is just a few hundred dollars to get across the finish line. This is going to go toward editing and cover design, and depending on how much I earn, interior design as well.

At different levels, you'll get the novella (in ebook, in print, or both), a well as the ebook of my novel Fiends of the Hub. If you give enough, I'll even deface your book with a Sharpie with something resembling my signature!

And, of course, you get your name in the book! All donors will see their names in the acknowledgements. Let strangers know you support the arts!

The Impact

This is really only going to impact whether I can both eat and get the story edited. Also, my wife, cats and guinea pigs. You don't want to disappoint guinea pigs, right? 

Risks & Challenges

I have a firm idea of how much I want to pay for services, but truth be told, I know full well that we'll probably run into other issues that will increase the cost. I am asking a hair over my estimate to cover the cost of sending physical books.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just get the word out. Let people know that an indie writer needs a little help, and it will go a long, long way.

Just get the word out. Let people know that an indie writer needs a little help, and it will go a long, long way.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Reint Laan, live in the Netherlands. I am a passionate actor, professional fool and also a private pilot. After being pensioned as a hospital clown five years ago, I made this story about the 'Dream of Flying' and presented it at airports, in aviation museums and after my flying friend Krijn Krijnsen built a mini Cub, I told this story in many schools. I have also been flying in America and met there the wonderful supercub.org family.

Through them I experienced the full freedom of flying, over rivers, on glaciers and even in the Rocky Mountains. By chance I told this story in New Holstein WI, at a small airshow.

One of the organizers, Mark Forss, invited me to present it at the vast Oshkosh Airventure in 2010. And there a lady asked me if she could buy the book.

And now the book is there, in the computer. And many people are waiting for this book, but I need the money to have it printed a thousand times. So I return to Oshkosh end of July, and present this book there. So help me to fund it! 

This book is about a dream comes true. In this case the dream of flying, flying in the air, which appears out of bound for so many youngsters. With my story I want to let people know, that if you follow your dream, whatever it may be, you can make it come true. That's what it is all about!

story:
¿Qué?

Mafia. Venganza en Chicago es una novela de género, en la delgada línea que separa al noir más puro del hard boiled, en la que dos grandes Mafias chocan de frente y como si de locomotoras se tratase todo a su alrededor se estremece...

A un inspector de homicidios de la ciudad de Chicago, alcohólico y mujeriego, se le asigna como compañera una recién licenciada, primera de su promoción, impuesta por los altos cargos de la Policía de Chicago, hartos de los incidentes que provoca en sus casos.

Mientras tanto, se conoce el asesinato de un miembro de la mafia irlandesa de Staten Island, la cual se haya en medio de una guerra en Nueva York. Este asesinato acaba por ser relacionado con el misterioso Scarface, Capo di tutti de la Mafia de Chicago, con lo que la batalla amenaza con sacudir la Ciudad del Viento.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy se nos presenta Alexandre Garrido.

Nací un 7 de Agosto de 1994 en la ciudad de Ourense, en los bellos parajes gallegos. Aunque inmerso en la Carrera de Historia, Geografía y Arte (es una sola carrera, no estoy tan mal de la cabeza como para hacerme tres a la vez), un pequeño bichito de la literatura me mordió de niño, haciendo que devorase con avidez sagas tan increíbles en mi vida como Harry Potter o El Señor de los Anillos.

Ahora paso del papel de receptor de contenido a ser el que lo crea llegando con mi primera novela; pensada como la primera parte de una futura saga que, si me dejáis, espero que os entretenga.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 800€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Mafia. Venganza en Chicago que saldría después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Alexandre Garrido vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
Nuestra historia


Rafael Vélez ha estudiado en el Conservatorio Nacional de Música de Bellas Artes, es fundador de Creta Teatro Abierto, director de casting en Escarabajo Azul, director de Characters México,  representación de actores. Ha dedicado su vida al ámbito artístico en México y ha decidido incursionar en la literatura con esta novela, recopilación de sus experiencias sobre esta vida y su cosmovisión imaginativa y única sobre el amor incondicional a la existencia.

León Alvarado Guerrero ha publicado en revistas de divulgación científica de la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México, además de administrar y editar un blog sobre análisis narrativo y artístico de videojuegos. Estudia el último año de la carrera de Letras Clásicas en la UNAM y funge como editor y corrector ortotipográfico de esta maravillosa novela.

Daniela Correa estudió comunicación visual en la universidad CENTRO, ha expuesto en el museo Franz Mayer de la Ciudad de México. Fungió como diseñadora a cargo de la imágen del Centro Cultural Universitario de Tlatelolco y también para el IX Simposio Internacional de Teoría sobre Arte Contemporáneo. Participó en el rediseño de la imágen de la Fundación INBA y de la tienda del Palacio de Bellas Artes, en colaboración con María Calderón.


Ofrecemos para su degustación el primer capítulo del libro, completamente gratis, de esta manera podrán convencerse de la calidad de trabajo que estamos presentando. Los enlaces para leerlo están justo aquí: 

  • PDF Una Mexicana que Fruta Vendía. –De once a una–
  • Ebook Una Mexicana que Fruta Vendía. –De once a una–


     
  • Una Mexicana que Fruta Vendía narra la historia de Sofía, una chica de la Ciudad de México que viaja a Alemania para estudiar en una prestigiosa universidad de Colonia. Encontrará en su camino a Inés y juntas vivirán una historia repleta de magia, amor y belleza, con un carácter narrativo único en su tipo, que invitará al lector a recrear con la imaginación la delicadeza sutil que nos envuelve día a día y que hemos perdido la costumbre de observar y sentir. Representa entonces los anhelos del escritor, por un mundo utópico pero plausible, donde el autor plasma la esencia encantadora que nos define como seres sensibles, capaces de esparcir el amor adonde quiera que vayamos.
  • Tu colaboración puede ayudarnos. Cada cantidad de dinero, grande o pequeña, es un impulso para volver realidad esta historia y fomentar un estímulo diferente en la manera en la que vivimos nuestras vidas como seres humanos.
    •  
 


 
 
 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 

Publicar una novela es un trabajo tremendamente dificultoso, mucho más si no se cuentan con los recursos económicos o las relaciones sociales necesarias. Hemos puesto en este trabajo nuestra alma y mucho más, contamos con un diseñador gráfico que se ha hecho cargo de crear la magnífica portada y los posters promocionales; entre nuestras filas está el editor, encargado de la corrección ortotipográfica y de estilo. Sumado a esto, el costo de publicación del primer tiraje y el de la mercadotecnia nos arroja una cifra fuerte para poder imprimir y distribuir la novela, que se ve reducida con este financiamiento.

 
     
  • Para costear la impresión, distribución, el pago al editor y al diseñador gráfico, buscamos un financiamiento de 3 000 USD.
    •  
  • De la misma manera, contamos con recompensas exclusivas para cada persona que deseé financiar nuestro proyecto, desde copias digitales hasta versiones físicas especiales para aquellos que confían en la novela.
    •  
  • Si por alguna razón no alcanzáramos a cubrir la meta, el dinero recaudado serviría para cubrir los pagos al editor y al diseñador, además de guardar lo sobrante con la esperanza de re-lanzar la campaña y cumplir nuestro objetivo. Al final resultaría un contratiempo, más que una pérdida.
 
 
 

El impacto que deseamos generar

 

En una sociedad que transcurre a través de la postmodernidad, la ideología y los valores del amor, el respeto y la pasión han trascendido sus definiciones. La carencia de carácter crítico ha desarrollado una falta de carisma en un amplio porcentaje de la juventud actual, envuelta en la frivolidad de la respuesta inmediata a sus estímulos, perpetuando ideologías que dejan de lado la contemplación y apreciación de nuestra sensibilidad humana y del entorno que nos rodea. Una Mexicana que Fruta Vendía  es un proyecto que busca reivindicar esos aspectos sociales y transmitir a los lectores las ideas de amor incondicional, la introspección y entendimiento de nuestro constructo social y cómo hemos llegado a él. A través de sus letras, Rafael Vélez nos confronta con un mundo en el que el amor a la vida y la pasión por lo que hacemos puede trascender las barreras de una frivolidad establecida y de esta manera, percibir con nuestros sentidos una realidad poco aparente que, sin embargo, siempre ha estado presente, oculta entre las grises capas de nuestra sociedad contemporánea; así, la fantasía y lo surreal se armonizan para relatar la aventura de una chica nacida en México, que viaja a la ciudad de Colonia con un sólo objetivo, entregar su amor y su pasión al mundo. 

 
     
     
 
 
 

Riesgos y desafíos

 

Como en todos los proyectos de publicación, pueden presentarse algunos riesgos menores, sin embargo, hemos considerado cada uno de ellos, llegando a discernir que las probabilidades de fallo son prácticamente nulas. Hemos cubierto cada uno de los aspectos, desde la editorial que se encargará de imprimir el primer tiraje, hasta las posibles complicaciones a la hora de entregar las recompensas físicas.

 
     
  • Problemas como aumento en el cobro de la impresión o la negativa por parte de la editorial a publicar determinado número de ejemplares serían cubiertos inmediatamente.
    •  
  • Los problemas en el envío de las diversas recompensas físicas serían tratados directamente con el financiador, para asegurar una comunicación constante y una resolución satisfactoria a cualquier tipo de incomodidad que pudiera presentarse.
    •  
 
 
 

¿No puedes financiar el proyecto? ¡No te apures! 

 

Si te has interesado en nuestro proyecto, pero no cuentas con la capacidad de financiarnos, no te preocupes, puedes ayudarnos de otra manera.

  • Comparte nuestra publicación entre tus conocidos, de esta manera nos permites llegar más lejos y eso es sumamente importante, pues amplias los horizontes de esta novela.
No olvides compartir usando las herramientas de Indiegogo, de esta forma podremos mantenernos al pendiente de la cantidad de ojos que llegan a mirar el proyecto.

   

 

Muchas gracias por interesarte en nuestra novela y esperamos que se deleiten con el primer capítulo que les ofrecemos.

story:
¿Qué?

Nada, otra vez nos muestra a un antihéroe en todo su esplendor que, aun narrado en primera persona por tan patético personaje, nos coloca por momentos en un punto de vista cercano al de su hijo de cinco años... y ahí es imposible esconder ciertas cosas.
 

Mario lleva una vida aparentemente feliz y corriente pero, a raíz de un desencuentro rutinario y banal con su hijo de cuatro o cinco años, se replantea su proyecto de vida. Se descubre a sí mismo envidiando las actitudes y modus vivendi de sus amigos y entra en una zozobra en las relaciones con su entorno y en un bucle sentimental que no le aporta nada.

¿Crisis de los 40?

¿Hastío vital?

En el fondo, el problema de Mario es que es un egoísta que lo único que quiere es hacer lo que le venga en gana sin tener que rendir cuentas a nadie. El protagonista secundario e involuntario es Marcos, el hijo que sufrirá las incapacidades de su padre, con quien vivirá una relación cada vez más superficial.

A través del texto, escrito en primera persona y en clave de humor, el patético Mario nos irá mostrando y justificando sus actitudes cada vez más egoístas y presentando a las personas de su entorno, siempre desde su demencial punto de vista.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Nacho Almirall.

Nacido en Barcelona en 1971, se trasladó con su familia en la infancia a vivir a Madrid, de donde volvió en plena efervescencia adolescente. Estudió Comunicación y Relaciones Públicas en Barcelona y, al finalizar, se fue a Nueva York a seguir con sus estudios, donde tuvo la oportunidad de trabajar en el departamento de Comunicación de una productora de vídeo. En la ciudad de los rascacielos conoció a la que hoy día es su mujer, con quien se casó en Barcelona en el año 2000 y tienen dos hijos. Desde 1995 trabaja en el sector de la Comunicación y las Relaciones Públicas, lo que le permite mantener un contacto diario con la escritura, los medios de comunicación y las diferentes maneras de transmitir un mensaje.

Lector empedernido, a los treinta años decidió apuntarse en los cursos de Narrativa de la Escuela de Escritura del Ateneu Barcelonès para intentar acabar alguno de los textos que hasta entonces había ido empezando a escribir. En la actualidad, además de su día a día en agencia de comunicación, Nacho Almirall es profesor de la Escuela Superior de Relaciones Públicas de Barcelona.

Nacho Almirall os sorprenderá.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Nada otra vez que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Nacho Almirall vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.
story_txt:
¿Qué?
Nada, otra vez nos muestra a un antihéroe en todo su esplendor que, aun narrado en primera persona por tan patético personaje, nos coloca por momentos en un punto de vista cercano al de su hijo de cinco años... y ahí es imposible esconder ciertas cosas. Mario lleva una vida aparentemente feliz y corriente pero, a raíz de un desencuentro rutinario y banal con su hijo de cuatro o cinco años, se replantea su proyecto de vida. Se descubre a sí mismo envidiando las actitudes y modus vivendi de sus amigos y entra en una zozobra en las relaciones con su entorno y en un bucle sentimental que no le aporta nada.
¿Crisis de los 40?
¿Hastío vital?
En el fondo, el problema de Mario es que es un egoísta que lo único que quiere es hacer lo que le venga en gana sin tener que rendir cuentas a nadie. El protagonista secundario e involuntario es Marcos, el hijo que sufrirá las incapacidades de su padre, con quien vivirá una relación cada vez más superficial.
A través del texto, escrito en primera persona y en clave de humor, el patético Mario nos irá mostrando y justificando sus actitudes cada vez más egoístas y presentando a las personas de su entorno, siempre desde su demencial punto de vista.
¿Quiénes? Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

enaA.com

presents

The Lost Kingdom/Izgubljeno kraljevstvo

There is a summary in English at the very bottom of this page. Hvala Hrvoje Hafner "haf-o-matic" na trudu oko videa, hvala Yeti Expedition na ustupanju video zapisa iz pokrajine Mustang. Hvala Duško Korlat na glazbi...

Dolaskom glavnog sponzora – mrežne trgovine enaA.com – službeno ime kampanje je: enaA.com - Izgubljeno kraljevstvo!

Dakle!

Riječ je o kraljevstvu Lo, u današnjem Nepalu, u pokrajini Mustang.

Dakle plan je otići u Mustang, popeti se – malo džipom, malo pješke, a malo klatareći se na magarcu – do grada Lo Manthang, prepričati najzanimljivija opažanja i ispucati hrpu fotografija.

Primijetit ćete da su dijelovi teksta koji nisu specifično vezani za Mustang slični kao i za lanjsku, vrlo uspješnu kampanju za Pamirski trakt, jer osnovna ideja je ista – otići negdje, u neku rupu svijeta za koju je malo tko čuo, i složiti putopis bogat jakim fotografijama (to zovem "fotopis").

Kakva je priča s tim "izgubljenim kraljevstvom" Lo?

Kao prvo, Izgubljeno kraljevstvo ili Lost Kingdom jednostavno sjajno zvuči, podsjeća na Indianu Jonesa, Svena Hedina, Warrena Langdona, braću Seljan, na neku poštenu i pamtljivu avanturu. Osim toga je i – istinito. Nepal je bio kraljevstvo stoljećima (više nije, ali o tome malo kasnije).

Jedna od provincija Nepala zove se Mustang – nema veze s američkim divljim konjima niti Ford Mustangom. Mustang je samo jedna, zapadnjacima najlakša, traskripcija imena provincije.

Mustang je po svemu različit od ostatka Nepala. Za početak, nalazi se u sjeni Himalaja pa ga ne zahvaća monsun. Za razliku od ostatka Nepala, Mustang je suh, nije zelen a niti pokriven snijegom. Kao drugo, Mustang je etnički i kulturološki bliži Tibetu, s kojim graniči na sjeveru, nego Nepalu. Neki putnici koji su bili na "pravom" Tibetu, kažu da su tibetansku kulturu najsnažnije osjetili baš u Mustangu.

I treće, Mustang je do pred svega nekoliko godina bio polu-nezavisno kraljevstvo Lo. I sam Nepal je bio kraljevstvo. Lo-Mustang imao je vlastitog kralja, koji je bio potčinjen nepalskom. Ovo nije neobično u kraljevskim odnosima. Kako je Nepal hendlao sve, pa i vanjsku politiku, minijaturno, izolirano, među planine zametnuto kraljevstvo Lo nije bilo nikakav međunarodni faktor.

A onda se desilo – što?

2008 u Nepalu je ukinuta kraljevina, i država je postala republika. Ovo je za Nepal bio big deal. Duga priča, da ne idemo previše u detalje – bit će vremena kasnije u priči kad krene putopis – kraljevstvo je u Nepalu abolirano 2008, a nestankom kraljevstva u samom Nepalu, nestalo je i ono u Lo-Mustangu. Otud naziv kampanje – Izgubljeno kraljevstvo, Lost Kingdom.

I zaista je Lost Kingdom!

Nakon leta za Katmandu, truckanja do Pokare i bauljanja do Jomsoma, iz tog grada kreće završni dio ekspedicije prema naselju Lo Manthang, glavnom gradu Loa, na visini od oko 4.000 metara – visina slična Pamiru lani. Da pravo kažem, nisam lud ni za hodanjem a još manje za planinarenjem. Zanimaju me PRIČE i FOTOGRAFIJE. Stoga je meni osobno najdraži način putovanja unajmljeni Land Cruiser, Pajero ili UAZ, ali ovaj put to neće biti posve moguće.

Lo-Mustang jednostavno nema cesta. Iako će se dio puta nadam se, pokriti terencem ili čak ponijem (mali tibetanski konji, poniji), neke dijelove morat ćemo pješačiti.

Tko smo to mi? Kao i lani na uspješnu ekspediciju na Pamir, planiram ići s Francoisom, frendom iz Francuske. Ako Francois bude morao odustati – idem sam ili u nekoj drugoj kombinaciji. Francois je inače super lik, lani je bio odličan partner, svakako bi volio ići s njim, stvari bi bile nekoliko puta lakše (uglavnom psihološki). Ovo smo ja i Francois u Kirgistanu, s tradicionalnim kirgiskim kapama.

Što ljudi kažu?

Ne znam jeste li pratili lanjsku kampanju na Pamir, organiziranu po sličnim principima. čitateljima se vrlo svidjela. Ovdje je samo kraći pregled njihovih komentara, bez navođenja imena:

Kao i uvijek - big support! Fasciniras determinacijom.

Inače zanimljivo nam pišeš, hoćemo još. Ja to naglas čitam ukućanima. Kao dokumentarac

Da je jednostavno ne bi bilo zanimljivo. Ovako možda ispadne i kakav epski deseterac od svega toga, koji će se prenositi s koljena na koljeno, uz gusle i to...

jel nosis kakvo hladno oruzje sa sobom?

Inače, predobra je slika, pogled vam je super iz ovog loungea

Yebote koja vukoyebina! a opet guštam uz pićence na terasi u ovu ljetnu noć čitat vaše priče

Luđaja!

Sjajna fotka. Onaj vrh lijevo gore budi radoznalost.

wallpaper country

pa ti brže pišeš nego što ja uspijem pratit! Bravo.

Sjajna fotka, a nebo čarobno...

kakav krajolik!

Koji dozivljaji. I sjajni opisi - kao da smo tamo.

S nestrpljenjem čekamo nastavak

Oleg ne bih te htio (naročito tebe) previše hvaliti da se ne umisliš, ali ova serija tekstova ti je jebeno dobra. Keep it up.

Tu kaj god uslikas sve izgleda fenomenalno!

Planine kao da su barsunom presvucene, super izgleda

Pa ovo postaje edukativni serijal Lijepo sam ovo pročitao i svašta naučio

Djeluje kao pejsaž u World of Tanks... Da ne znam da si tamo rekao bih da je umjetno koliko je vanzemaljski... Ovo postaje vrhunski!

Lajkam ovo. Fakat je super

Tvoji zapisi su mi omiljena ljetna literatura u kombinaciji s Don Quijoteom

Genijalnooooo

S guštom gledam svaku tvoju sliku i uživam

Prevara u rangu režiranog slijetanja na Mjesec!

Jebate patak šta je dobro ovo.

Uf, blagi nadrealizam. Izvrsna fotka, briljantna

Fotke sve ljepše i ljepše izgledaju!

mrak fotka!

Wow, jebena fotka

ubojstvo od teksta

Ovo ti je najzabavniji tekst ikad

Ovi tvoji tekstovi su prajsles

Fantastično!

Divno!

Divna fotografija

Ajme guštaaa.... ispisat ću se s grupe, ne mogu ovo više gledat

Dragi Olegže, ti si jebeni talent

Nadrealno

čoeče....kodasinanekojdrugojplaneti

Sjajan serijal fotki. Prekrasan krajolik

Ovo je neka druga planeta

Oleže, ovo je jedna od najboljih (iako su sve koje ti okineš bolje od top-topova najboljih (ne uvlačim se))- definitivno se osjeti neka druga energija, neki drugi svijet....jel to uopće na ovoj planeti zvanoj Zemlja?

ne znam koji sam se put već danas vratila na ovu sliku. zen. čisti zen.

nestvarno divna fotografija

Koje ludilo! Kao da citam neki novi scenarij brace Coen u stilu new western-a

fotka je..nadrealna!

k'o pravi Dalmatinac, sve bolji što ti je lošije.

Meni je ova fotka moto monumentna!

stvarno pratim s nevjerovatnim isčekivanjima tvoj svaki post. Valjda kao nekad izvještaje o Neil Armstrongu. Dojam nestvarnosti je, pretpostavljam, vrlo sličan. Tako dalek od naše svakodnevnice i vlastitih iskustava

Please take my money (citaj: hocu iducu kampanju)

Olegže meni je to bio super putopis!

Svaka čast, svake lipe je vrijedilo

Jedva čekam novu kampanju

Fala Oleg, bilo je fakat odlično! Nadam se nekom novom putopisu u budućnosti

Dakle Hrvatska do Pamira... Tko je sudjelovao i pratio, obogatio se fantastičnim fotkama i saznanjima i osjeća se, zacijelo, kao i ja nevjerojatno privilegiran.

OK SKEPTICI JESAM LI VAS UVJERIO??!! :o)

Kad se ide?

Plan je kolovoz 2016. Nitko normalan, inače, ne ide u Nepal u kolovozu, jer je tad sezona monsuna u snazi, kišno je, vlažno i bezveze. Za posjete Nepalu kolovoz je kao nama siječanj – dno sezone. Međutim, kako sam napomenuo, ovo ne važi za Mustang, ili barem ne u tolikoj mjeri, jer je ova neobična provincija u sjeni Himalaja i ne zahvaća je monsun.

Zašto biste trebali podržati ovu kampanju?

Zato što ti osobno koji ovo čitaš nećeš nikad u životu otići tamo. Ne zanima te, ne da ti se, daleko je.... IPAK, imaš priliku sudjelovati u odlasku u Izgubljeno kraljevstvo – preko ove kampanje! Neka atom tebe ipak ide tamo, atom zvan dolar, kuna, dojčmarka. Gledat ćeš fotke, postove odande i pomisiliti "i djelić mene je sad tamo u toj pripizdini".

Ako spadaš u 1% onih koji planiraju ići, ali negdje u budućnosti, onda se opet isplati sudjelovati u kampanji jer čitat ćeš putopisne opaske pa ćeš na temelju njih bolje isplanirati svoj vlastiti put i imat ćeš kvalitetnu fotku da te podsjeća na nešto gdje si i sam bio, tj bit ćeš jednom kada i ako odeš tamo.

Što se dobije zauzvrat, šta ima od perkova?

Ovo je jednostavna kampanja i nema puno perkova.

16 doloresa - Fotopis

Za 16 dolara (popust u odnosu na Pamir lani) dobiješ putopis, sve postove i fotke koje ću stavljati kao pripremu i sa samog putovanja. Računam dosta pisati i u pripremnoj fazi, tema je zaista zanimljiva i ima materijala. Naravno, i sa samog lica mjesta ću stavljati fotke, putopisne crtice i slično. Lani s Pamira bilo je ukupno preko 200 fotki i 110.000 znakova teksta – dakle teksta za omanji roman!

Ovo s putopisom mislim riješiti vrlo jednostavno. Tko uplati 16 dolara, jednostavno ću ga dodati u posebnu zatvorenu grupu na Facebooku za ovaj projekt, i postove za one koji su pomogli kampanju učiniti vidljivima grupi "pomagača" da ih oni gledaju i da im osvježe dan, a drugi ne vide. Putopis i fotke neće biti Public!

Nije neka sigurnost s pet ključeva PGP-a, OIB-om i identifikacijom mrežnice, nego jednostavno, fleksibilno i za korisnika potpuno bezbolno. Kad uplatiš 16 dolara za putopis na Fejsu, više NE TREBAŠ URADITI NIŠTA, samo budi na Fejsu, imam tvoje ime i ideš na distro listu za odgovarajuće Fejs postove vezane s putopisom i to je to. Ne može lakše.

Sjedit ćeš sredinom kolovoza na Jadranu i dignuti Fejs "ajd baš da vidim šta ima" a tamo – postovi s Himalaje, neka budala gladan i smrznut u nekim vrletima. LOL! I još mora fotkati jer je obećao u kampanji. Nasmiješ se idiotu i nastaviš pržiti na suncu, pijuć koktel i gledajuć komade.

Ovaj model isti je kao za lanjsku ekspediciju na Pamir i funkcionirao je odlično. Cijena perka je niža nego lani!

50 doloresa – Fotopis F+

Isto kao fotopis, samo za one koji mogu i žele pomoći malo više! Prošli put sam u ovom rangu nudio Fotopis + pivo, ali onda se desilo sljedeće – nakon povratka kad sam ponudio ljudima da se nađemo i "odradimo" dogovoreno pivo koje im pripada, svi su u nekoj gužvi, ovo, ono, a ja sam zapravo sve s terena ispričao, i fotke stavio, već u putopisu. Tako da je to s pivom ispalo malo promašeno.

U svakom slučaju – budući da je 16 dolara zbilja sitna lova, tko želi pomoći s 50 – samo naprijed, cijenim to, ekspedicija ima velike troškove.... a što se piva tiče, lako se dogovorimo.

199 doloresa – Big Picture

Lovatori i oni koji vole umjetnost – ne znam kako će se pogledati u ogledalo ako ne uzmu ovaj jaki perk od 199 dolara... uspješni startupi, njihovi pokretači, investitori, vlasnici iPhonea, kapitalisti, neoliberali, paleoanarhisti, ljubitelji Tesli, mrzitelji Tesli, poduzetnici, saborski zastupnici, socijalisti, kriminalci.... a svih njih ima među mojim frendovima.... KGB ZNA da ovo čitate.... hehe....

U sklopu tog perka dobije se divna slika za staviti na zid – poput ovih koje vidite na fotografijama iznad i ispod ovog pasusa.

Slike s fotografija dio su mog projekta Without People – nisu s Pamira niti iz Mustanga, već samo ilustracija kako slika ovog formata, koja je dio perka, izgleda. Ovo doli je surovi neoliberal Nikša i njegova slika za Without People u gepeku.

Kliknite gore na tab Gallery, tamo je par primjera mojih fotografija, koje NISU iz Mustanga – logično, jer tamo tek trebam otići – ali koje vam daju neku ideju kakav krajolik očekujem i kakav tip fotografija planiram napraviti. Ovo su inače moje fotografije iz Pamira, Armenije, Kazahstana, Tajlanda, Irske, Turske, Kalifornije i Nevade (SAD), s lokacija donekle sličnih Mustangu, samo da vam da neku ideju.

499 doloresa – Neoliberal Bastard

Ovo je corporate package – imaš firmu, aute, robote, virtualne điđe, datacentre, softvere, ekstraprofite, saprofite? ...aj ne škrtari, pokaži da si baja! S ovim perkom ću na lokaciju uzeti i vaše predmete, majice, proizvode, i napraviti par reklamnih slika na licu mjesta, podijeliti domorocima ili nešto slično. Paket uključuje naravno praćenje same kampanje (za koliko god ljudi unutar firme želite), sliku velikog formata za na zid i po želji reklamiranje proizvoda/kompanije na licu mjesta.

Ovo je legenda Zafar, u Dušanbeu, s majicom muzeja Marco Polo Korčula. (Zafar se čudio simbolu na majici, nikad nije vidio sidro!)

Ovo je profesor Tursunbay, u selu Aličur, s brendiranom busolom Marco Polo.

999 doloresa – Kralj Loa

Ovaj je perk dostupan samo jedan. Uključuje mogućnost imenovanja cijele ekspedicije po vašoj tvrtci, promo fotke s logićima firme uz put, zastave, majice, slikanje kraj Annapurne u majici s korporativnim logom... plus sve u ovom prethodnom perku (slika za na zid, putopis itd).

Dio skupljene love donirat ću nekoj udruzi za stradale od potresa u Nepalu, po svom odabiru!

*************************

Što s lovom ako ne odem?

Imam namjeru otići u Mustang kad-tad, dakle jedini realni problem koji se može dogoditi jest odgoda puta zbog nečega, nemam pojma čega. Ako se baš desi da iz bilo kojeg razloga – geopolitičkog, zdravstvenog... nikako ne mogu u Mustang... onda mogu obećati da ću sredstva po vrlo sličnom planu iskoristiti za neki sličan projekt, možda čak i zanimljiviji. Myanmar (Burma), Bolivija, Jakutija, Osetija, Transnistria, neka izgubljena, ali zanimljiva rupetina u svakom slučaju...

Isto vrijedi i ako se ne ispuni financijski cilj. Ekspedicija u Mustang vrlo je skupa. Ako se ne skupi ciljani iznos – putopis će biti s neke druge, skromnije lokacije. U svakom slučaju – bit će zanimljivo....

English summary

Hi, this is a campaign to get funding for expedition to Mustang province in Nepal, the seat of the former Kingdom of Lo. This Kingdom is no more, it was abolished along with Kingdom of Nepal itself, back in 2008.

The project is in Croatian, because I plan to go there and write travelogue in Croatian language, for my Croat readers (and others who understand Croatian). I will also post high quality photos – in fact, photos are the main motivation to go there. So, since photos do not require any translation – if you like nice photos you can support the campaign too... thanks.

Rijeka Pjanž - granica s Afganistanom
