Kao prvo, Izgubljeno
kraljevstvo ili Lost Kingdom jednostavno sjajno zvuči, podsjeća na Indianu
Jonesa, Svena Hedina, Warrena Langdona, braću Seljan, na neku poštenu i
pamtljivu avanturu. Osim toga je i – istinito. Nepal je bio kraljevstvo
stoljećima (više nije, ali o tome malo kasnije). 
Jedna od
provincija Nepala zove se Mustang – nema veze s američkim divljim konjima niti
Ford Mustangom. Mustang je samo jedna, zapadnjacima najlakša, traskripcija
imena provincije. 
Mustang je
po svemu različit od ostatka Nepala. Za početak, nalazi se u sjeni Himalaja pa
ga ne zahvaća monsun. Za razliku od ostatka Nepala, Mustang je suh, nije zelen
a niti pokriven snijegom. Kao drugo, Mustang je etnički i kulturološki bliži
Tibetu, s kojim graniči na sjeveru, nego Nepalu. Neki putnici koji su bili na
"pravom" Tibetu, kažu da su tibetansku kulturu najsnažnije osjetili
baš u Mustangu.
I treće, Mustang je do pred svega nekoliko godina bio
polu-nezavisno kraljevstvo Lo. I sam Nepal je bio kraljevstvo. Lo-Mustang imao
je vlastitog kralja, koji je bio potčinjen nepalskom. Ovo nije neobično u
kraljevskim odnosima. Kako je Nepal hendlao sve, pa i vanjsku politiku,
minijaturno, izolirano, među planine zametnuto kraljevstvo Lo nije bilo nikakav
međunarodni faktor.
A onda se
desilo – što?
2008 u
Nepalu je ukinuta kraljevina, i država je postala republika. Ovo je za Nepal
bio big deal. Duga priča,
da ne idemo previše u detalje – bit će vremena kasnije u priči kad krene
putopis – kraljevstvo je u Nepalu abolirano 2008, a nestankom kraljevstva u
samom Nepalu, nestalo je i ono u Lo-Mustangu. Otud naziv kampanje – Izgubljeno
kraljevstvo, Lost Kingdom.
I zaista je
Lost Kingdom!
Nakon leta
za Katmandu, truckanja do Pokare i bauljanja do Jomsoma, iz tog grada kreće
završni dio ekspedicije prema naselju Lo Manthang, glavnom gradu Loa, na visini
od oko 4.000 metara – visina slična Pamiru lani. Da pravo kažem, nisam lud ni
za hodanjem a još manje za planinarenjem. Zanimaju me PRIČE i FOTOGRAFIJE.
Stoga je meni osobno najdraži način putovanja unajmljeni Land Cruiser, Pajero
ili UAZ, ali ovaj put to neće biti posve moguće. 
Lo-Mustang
jednostavno nema cesta. Iako će se dio puta nadam se, pokriti terencem ili čak
ponijem (mali tibetanski konji, poniji), neke dijelove morat ćemo pješačiti. 
Tko smo to
mi? Kao i lani na uspješnu ekspediciju na Pamir, planiram ići s Francoisom, frendom iz
Francuske. Ako Francois bude morao odustati – idem sam ili u nekoj drugoj
kombinaciji. Francois je inače super lik, lani je bio odličan partner, svakako
bi volio ići s njim, stvari bi bile nekoliko puta lakše (uglavnom psihološki). Ovo smo ja i Francois u Kirgistanu, s tradicionalnim kirgiskim kapama.
Što ljudi kažu?
Ne znam
jeste li pratili lanjsku kampanju na Pamir, organiziranu po sličnim
principima. čitateljima se vrlo svidjela. Ovdje je samo kraći pregled njihovih
komentara, bez navođenja imena:
Kao i uvijek - big support! Fasciniras determinacijom.Inače zanimljivo nam pišeš, hoćemo još. Ja to naglas
čitam ukućanima. Kao dokumentaracDa je jednostavno ne bi
bilo zanimljivo. Ovako možda ispadne i kakav epski deseterac od svega toga,
koji će se prenositi s koljena na koljeno, uz gusle i to...
jel nosis kakvo hladno
oruzje sa sobom?
Inače, predobra je slika, pogled vam je super iz ovog
loungea
Yebote koja vukoyebina! a opet guštam uz pićence na
terasi u ovu ljetnu noć čitat vaše priče
Luđaja!
Sjajna fotka. Onaj vrh lijevo gore budi radoznalost.
wallpaper country
pa ti brže pišeš nego što ja uspijem pratit! Bravo.
Sjajna fotka, a nebo čarobno...
kakav krajolik!
Koji dozivljaji. I sjajni opisi - kao da smo tamo.
S nestrpljenjem čekamo nastavakOleg ne bih te htio (naročito tebe)
previše hvaliti da se ne umisliš, ali ova serija tekstova ti je jebeno dobra.
Keep it up.
Tu kaj god uslikas sve izgleda fenomenalno!
Planine kao da su barsunom presvucene, super izgleda
Pa ovo postaje edukativni serijal Lijepo sam ovo pročitao
i svašta naučio
Djeluje kao pejsaž u World of Tanks... Da ne znam da si tamo rekao bih da je umjetno
koliko je vanzemaljski... Ovo postaje vrhunski!
Lajkam ovo. Fakat je super
Tvoji zapisi su mi omiljena ljetna literatura u
kombinaciji s Don Quijoteom
Genijalnooooo
S guštom gledam svaku tvoju sliku i uživam
Prevara u rangu režiranog slijetanja na Mjesec!
Jebate patak šta je
dobro ovo.
Uf, blagi nadrealizam.
Izvrsna fotka, briljantna
Fotke sve ljepše i
ljepše izgledaju!
mrak fotka!
Wow, jebena fotka
ubojstvo od teksta
Ovo ti je najzabavniji
tekst ikad
Ovi tvoji tekstovi su prajsles
Fantastično!
Divno!
Divna fotografija
Ajme guštaaa.... ispisat ću se s grupe, ne mogu ovo više
gledat 
Dragi Olegže, ti si jebeni talent
Nadrealno
čoeče....kodasinanekojdrugojplaneti
Sjajan serijal fotki. Prekrasan krajolik
Ovo je neka druga planeta
Oleže, ovo je jedna od najboljih (iako su sve koje ti
okineš bolje od top-topova najboljih (ne uvlačim se))- definitivno se osjeti
neka druga energija, neki drugi svijet....jel to uopće na ovoj planeti zvanoj
Zemlja?
ne znam koji sam se put već danas vratila na ovu sliku.
zen. čisti zen.
nestvarno divna fotografija
Koje ludilo! Kao da citam neki novi scenarij brace Coen u
stilu new western-a
fotka je..nadrealna!
k'o pravi Dalmatinac, sve bolji što ti je lošije.
Meni je ova fotka moto monumentna!
stvarno pratim s nevjerovatnim isčekivanjima tvoj svaki
post. Valjda kao nekad izvještaje o Neil Armstrongu. Dojam nestvarnosti je,
pretpostavljam, vrlo sličan. Tako dalek od naše svakodnevnice i vlastitih
iskustava
Please take my money (citaj: hocu iducu kampanju)
Olegže meni je to bio super putopis!
Svaka čast, svake lipe
je vrijedilo
Jedva čekam novu kampanju
Fala Oleg, bilo je fakat
odlično! Nadam se nekom novom putopisu u budućnosti
Dakle Hrvatska do
Pamira... Tko je sudjelovao i pratio, obogatio se fantastičnim fotkama i
saznanjima i osjeća se, zacijelo, kao i ja nevjerojatno privilegiran.OK SKEPTICI JESAM LI VAS UVJERIO??!!
:o)
Kad se ide?
Plan je kolovoz 2016. Nitko normalan, inače, ne ide u
Nepal u kolovozu, jer je tad sezona monsuna u snazi, kišno je, vlažno i
bezveze. Za posjete Nepalu kolovoz je kao nama siječanj – dno sezone. Međutim,
kako sam napomenuo, ovo ne važi za Mustang, ili barem ne u tolikoj mjeri, jer
je ova neobična provincija u sjeni Himalaja i ne zahvaća je monsun.
Zašto biste
trebali podržati ovu kampanju?
Zato što ti
osobno koji ovo čitaš nećeš nikad u životu otići tamo. Ne zanima te, ne da ti se, daleko je.... IPAK, imaš priliku sudjelovati u odlasku u Izgubljeno
kraljevstvo – preko ove kampanje! Neka atom tebe ipak ide tamo, atom zvan
dolar, kuna, dojčmarka. Gledat ćeš fotke, postove odande i pomisiliti "i
djelić mene je sad tamo u toj pripizdini". 
Ako spadaš u
1% onih koji planiraju ići, ali negdje u budućnosti, onda se opet isplati
sudjelovati u kampanji jer čitat ćeš putopisne opaske pa ćeš na temelju njih
bolje isplanirati svoj vlastiti put i imat ćeš kvalitetnu fotku da te podsjeća
na nešto gdje si i sam bio, tj bit ćeš jednom kada i ako odeš tamo. 





Što se
dobije zauzvrat, šta ima od perkova?
Ovo je
jednostavna kampanja i nema puno perkova.
16 doloresa -
Fotopis
Za 16 dolara (popust u odnosu na Pamir lani) dobiješ 
putopis, sve postove i fotke koje ću stavljati kao pripremu i sa samog
putovanja. Računam dosta pisati i u pripremnoj fazi, tema je zaista zanimljiva
i ima materijala. Naravno, i sa samog lica mjesta ću stavljati fotke, putopisne
crtice i slično. Lani s Pamira bilo je ukupno preko 200 fotki i 110.000 znakova
teksta – dakle teksta za omanji roman! 
Ovo s putopisom mislim
riješiti vrlo jednostavno. Tko uplati 16 dolara, jednostavno ću ga dodati u posebnu zatvorenu grupu na Facebooku za ovaj projekt, i postove za one koji su pomogli kampanju
učiniti vidljivima grupi "pomagača" da ih oni gledaju i da im
osvježe dan, a drugi ne vide. Putopis i fotke neće biti Public! 
Nije neka sigurnost s pet
ključeva PGP-a, OIB-om i identifikacijom mrežnice, nego jednostavno, fleksibilno
i za korisnika potpuno bezbolno. Kad uplatiš 16 dolara za putopis na Fejsu,
više NE TREBAŠ URADITI NIŠTA, samo budi na Fejsu, imam tvoje ime i ideš na
distro listu za odgovarajuće Fejs postove vezane s putopisom i to je to. Ne može
lakše.
Sjedit ćeš sredinom kolovoza
na Jadranu i dignuti Fejs "ajd baš da vidim šta ima" a tamo – postovi
s Himalaje, neka budala gladan i smrznut u nekim vrletima. LOL! I još mora
fotkati jer je obećao u kampanji. Nasmiješ se idiotu i nastaviš pržiti na
suncu, pijuć koktel i gledajuć komade.
Ovaj model isti je kao za
lanjsku ekspediciju na Pamir i funkcionirao je odlično. Cijena perka je niža
nego lani!
50 doloresa –
Fotopis F+
Isto kao fotopis,
samo za one koji mogu i žele pomoći malo više! Prošli put sam u ovom
rangu nudio Fotopis + pivo, ali onda se desilo sljedeće – nakon povratka kad
sam ponudio ljudima da se nađemo i "odradimo" dogovoreno pivo koje im
pripada, svi su u nekoj gužvi, ovo, ono, a ja sam zapravo sve s terena
ispričao, i fotke stavio, već u putopisu. Tako da je to s pivom ispalo malo
promašeno. 
U svakom slučaju –
budući da je 16 dolara zbilja sitna lova, tko želi pomoći s 50 – samo naprijed,
cijenim to, ekspedicija ima velike troškove.... a što se piva tiče, lako
se dogovorimo.
199 doloresa – Big
Picture
Lovatori i oni koji vole
umjetnost – ne znam kako će se pogledati u ogledalo ako ne uzmu ovaj jaki perk
od 199 dolara... uspješni startupi, njihovi pokretači, investitori, vlasnici
iPhonea, kapitalisti, neoliberali, paleoanarhisti, ljubitelji Tesli, mrzitelji
Tesli, poduzetnici, saborski zastupnici, socijalisti, kriminalci.... a svih njih ima među
mojim frendovima.... KGB ZNA da ovo čitate.... hehe.... 
U sklopu tog perka dobije se
divna slika za staviti na zid – poput ovih koje vidite na fotografijama iznad i
ispod ovog pasusa.
Slike s fotografija dio su
mog projekta Without People – nisu s Pamira niti iz Mustanga, već samo
ilustracija kako slika ovog formata, koja je dio perka, izgleda. Ovo doli je
surovi neoliberal Nikša i njegova slika za Without People u gepeku.
Kliknite gore na tab
Gallery, tamo je par primjera mojih fotografija, koje NISU iz Mustanga – logično, jer
tamo tek trebam otići – ali koje vam daju neku ideju kakav krajolik očekujem i
kakav tip fotografija planiram napraviti. Ovo su inače moje fotografije iz
Pamira, Armenije, Kazahstana, Tajlanda, Irske, Turske, Kalifornije i Nevade (SAD), s
lokacija donekle sličnih Mustangu, samo da vam da neku ideju.
499
doloresa – Neoliberal Bastard
Ovo je corporate package – imaš firmu, aute, robote, virtualne điđe, datacentre, softvere, ekstraprofite, saprofite? ...aj ne škrtari, pokaži da si baja! S ovim perkom ću na lokaciju uzeti i vaše predmete, majice, proizvode, i napraviti par reklamnih slika na licu mjesta, podijeliti domorocima ili nešto slično. Paket uključuje naravno praćenje same kampanje (za koliko god ljudi unutar firme želite), sliku velikog formata za na zid i po želji reklamiranje proizvoda/kompanije na licu mjesta.Ovo je legenda Zafar, u Dušanbeu, s majicom muzeja Marco Polo Korčula. (Zafar se čudio simbolu na majici, nikad nije vidio sidro!) 
Ovo je profesor Tursunbay, u selu Aličur, s brendiranom busolom Marco Polo.
999 doloresa – Kralj
Loa
Ovaj je perk dostupan samo
jedan. Uključuje mogućnost imenovanja cijele ekspedicije po vašoj tvrtci, promo
fotke s logićima firme uz put, zastave, majice, slikanje kraj Annapurne u
majici s korporativnim logom... plus sve u ovom prethodnom perku (slika za na
zid, putopis itd).
Dio skupljene love donirat
ću nekoj udruzi za stradale od potresa u Nepalu, po svom odabiru!*************************

Što
s lovom ako ne odem?
Imam namjeru otići u Mustang
kad-tad, dakle jedini realni problem koji se može dogoditi jest odgoda puta
zbog nečega, nemam pojma čega. Ako se baš desi da iz bilo kojeg razloga –
geopolitičkog, zdravstvenog... nikako ne mogu u Mustang... onda mogu obećati da
ću sredstva po vrlo sličnom planu iskoristiti za neki sličan projekt, možda čak
i zanimljiviji. Myanmar (Burma), Bolivija, Jakutija, Osetija, Transnistria, neka izgubljena, ali zanimljiva rupetina u svakom slučaju...
Isto vrijedi i ako se ne
ispuni financijski cilj. Ekspedicija u Mustang vrlo je skupa. Ako se ne
skupi ciljani iznos – putopis će biti s neke druge, skromnije lokacije. U
svakom slučaju – bit će zanimljivo....
English
summary
Hi, this is a campaign to
get funding for expedition to Mustang province in Nepal, the seat of the former
Kingdom of Lo. This Kingdom is no more, it was abolished along with Kingdom of
Nepal itself, back in 2008. 
The project is in Croatian,
because I plan to go there and write travelogue in Croatian language, for my
Croat readers (and others who understand Croatian). I will also post high
quality photos – in fact, photos are the main motivation to go there. So, since
photos do not require any translation – if you like nice photos you can support
the campaign too... thanks.Rijeka Pjanž - granica s Afganistanom

story:
OUR story/ies. OUR way.

 

BlackBoard, Northwestern University’s Black student magazine, serves as an open forum for student expression. The curators of the magazine hope to challenge the audience to think critically in order to move out of orthodox thought processes. Ubuntu, “I am because we are,” is the slogan of the magazine that acts as a symbol for a unified Black community, for we realize that without honoring all of our intricate and diverse identities, we have nothing. With a determined staff and dedicated board, this publication will provide a world of knowledge and food for thought on a consistent basis.

BlackBoard’s goals are:

To fill the void in the Black community most publications cannot reach. BlackBoard will provide the campus and surrounding areas with a perspective of the Black Community they would not normally see. And give voice to a Black community, which is usually misunderstood.

To inform readers with current news, thoughts, ideas and themes in a timely fashion following a sound journalism code of ethics. BlackBoard will spread the thoughts and ideas of the community to the community through open communication following the guidelines of quality journalism, codes and ethics.

To become a leading source of information for all marginalized people on Northwestern’s campus to look forward to. BlackBoard will go beyond the boundaries of Northwestern’s campus to find the intersectional and inclusive voice that so needs to be heard.

---

BlackBoard was brought back to NU's campus in Spring 2016, and since then we've been telling the organic stories of Black students on campus - unfiltered and not diluted. We're ready to take the next step and release our print magazine this Fall quarter and, of course, that's a financial cost. Please support Black narratives on campus and donate!

story:
The Book

Manning Up: Transsexual Men on Finding Brotherhood, Family, and Themselves is a groundbreaking anthology featuring the voices of a diverse group of trans men.  Contributors to the book include seasoned writers such as Max Wolf Valerio and Aaron Devor, as well as first-time authors.  

These pieces go far beyond the typical discussion of coming out and physical transition that is so common in our community.  Each writer digs deep, gets personal, and talks about the joys and pains of transition, becoming male, and being a man.  Topics that are touched on include:

  • Fatherhood: raising kids, wanting kids, and being a male role model
  • Communities of men: finding people who make us feel complete
  • Religion: reconciling our spiritual path(s) with our gender transition
  • Sexuality and relationships: discovering how our maleness affects how we partner
  • ...and much more

Manning Up is slated for release by Transgress Press on June 1, 2014.  


The Events

Transgress Press has covered the costs for copyediting, printing, and distribution, but money has run out.  We need help to give this book the incredible kick-off it deserves.

The editors of Manning Up, Zander Keig and Mitch Kellaway, are collaborating with contributing authors and Visible Bodies: Transgender Narratives Retold to put on four release events around North America.  

  • San Francisco, CA: June 17, 2014
  • Boston, MA: June 24, 2014
  • Vancouver, BC: June 8, 2014
  • San Diego, CA: July 2014 (exact date TBD) 

Attendees to these events will get to meet the authors and editors of Manning Up, will hear readings from selected pieces, and will be able to purchase copies of the book and the cover art (photo credit: Wolfgang, Visible Bodies: San Diego).  

The costs of the four events will vary.  An estimated budget for a typical event is:

  • $150-250 for rental of room, chairs, and tables
  • $100 for event insurance
  • $100-150 for food & beverage
  • $25 for decorations
  • $25-50 for alcohol license
for a total of $425-675 per event.  We plan to get as much donated as possible, keeping the costs under $500 per event.  

Any excess funds will remain with Visible Bodies: Transgender Narratives Retold, and will be used as seed money for exciting future projects planned by our organization.  Feel free to contact Scott, the founder of Visible Bodies, for more details.  


For More Information

Please feel free to contact the Manning Up or Visible Bodies teams if you:

  • ...live in one of the cities hosting an event and you'd like more information
  • ...would like to make a non-cash donation (food, beverage, etc.) to an event
  • ...do not live in a host city, but are interested in organizing a Manning Up release event where you live
  • ...want more information on Transgress Press or Visible Bodies
  • ...have any other questions!  

THANK YOU for helping to make Manning Up a reality!

story:
One of my friends once attempted to breakdown cooking to me and as simply as he as he could he put it like this: “Maggie, to make good food you need good ingredients. That’s step one.”

Well if I were to apply that way of thinking to writing than as a writer I’d be the chef or cook. The ingredients would be what I write about and how I tell that story. And my equipment would be the physical tools I use to get those meals (aka stories) out. In this digital world, my computer is my stove.

With that in mind, I’m coming to you and humbly asking, “Can you help this writer upgrade her technology and launch a brand new project? Who am I? I’m Maggie. I’m an LA resident, California State University of Los Angeles graduate, with a degree in Broadcast Journalism; my reporting involves all media platforms, and spans a diverse range of topics.

I’m a Writer. Blogger. Journalist.

What am I asking for? I’m asking for your help. I need better and additional tools for my craft because I’m creating a PODCAST!!! To be aptly named: “Remind Me to Tell You...” (interesting12’s discussion podcast)

At the present time my news/ news commentary, culture, question asking, answer digging, medley of a website: http://interesting12.wordpress.com, has a monthly readership of between 1000-1500. It’s a blog platform that informs, empowers and educates. That’s why I write.

I’m active on a number of websites; I’ve been published online in newspaper print. My writing resume has touched base on an assortment of topics including mental health, current events, politics, opinion, international news, science, psychology, sex, religion, gender matters, crime, and entertainment. (To name a few!)

I bring all the jazz of those themes to interesting12 wrapped in the notion of if it’s interesting it can be good, bad, or up for consideration: so bring on that consideration! I’m a somewhat opinionated, yet still faithful to both sides, kind of storyteller- and I’d like to think I have jokes. I want to bring more dynamics to my table with a podcast that will hit the streets, involve interviews, a panel discussion here or there perhaps, and an audio promotion of people doing things worthy of a little chit chat.

It will be a bimonthly show, roughly 40min in length, with several segments serving as an extension to interesting12.

-Brief intro that highlights a news story topical to the day of recording

-Further analysis and discussion by way of interviews and/or on location additional reporting, on two recent featured or standard postings.

-One bonus topic discussion not previously mentioned on the website

-Rounded out with a segment called: That’s Fantastic! That will be used to promote or feature the good works of a person, organization, or event.

The needed funds will be directly used to purchase tools necessary for audio recording and editing, cover web page hosting costs, as well as for updating my basic computer needs.

My plans for this supplemental audio content are to not only reward my current readers, but lay down a welcome mat to new readers and those with more listening time, verses reading time. As a passionate cook of words, I want to feed a lot of mouths, and provide substance in a variety of flavors.

Intersted in other ways you can help?

CHECK OUT MY BLOG! Tell your friends!! Spread the word! At the end of the day I have a need to learn and a bigger need to share what I learn with others. Help me do what I love to do, increase my website traffic, follow me on twitter, and the many forms of social media I play on. I'm looking to obtain appropriate site sponsorship and be involved in other collaborations. You being involved in any way helps that. And I thank you.

Thanks for reading! (**please donate!!**)

story:
Heart of the Author

Hello, my name is Earl Minter. I am 54 years young and keep getting better like aged wine. I was born in Cleveland, Ohio, and graduated from John F. Kennedy High class of '76, majored in Accounting and Finance at the University of Cincinnati. I moved to Baltimore, MD in 1980 landing a career with the Federal Government for the past 24 years and counting, a member of New Psalmist Baptist Church since 1996 where I teach new members class and serve on several other ministries. I am happily married with seven children, five grandchildren, and a mentor to a host of other young men.

I interact with people almost 24/7, which has caused me to understand the importance of relationships and how they play a major part in shaping a person self-esteem. After feeling and seeing the effects of divorce, I have witnessed how it can cause a negative effect on all parties involved, if you do not seek God's healing hand. In my life, it always seemed liked someone was always being thrown away or as we say, "Kicked to the curb". But, the LORD began to speak to me about how much value he has placed in all our lives, and that began to help change my behavior. Exdous19:5 says "Now therefore, if ye will obey My voice indeed, and keep My covenant, then ye shall be a peculiar treasure unto Me above all people: for all the earth is Mine." While growing up, I heard people say, "One man's trash is another man's treasure." I know people are not trash, but they are treasures just waiting to be discovered. We have to allow God's Words about us, to determine who we are and not let how people treat us shape our value.

I have taught and studied the Bible for years but had trouble trying to apply the teaching so that I could get the victory that God promised in every situation. 2 Corinthians 2:14 says "Now thanks be to God, which always causeth us to triumph in Christ, and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place." It's has become my driving passion to see people win in every situation just like God has taught me how to. When I got the revelation that the understanding comes in the doing of the word and not just in the studying. Most of us want to understand first and than we are willing to do, but that is how we get this faith principle backwards. It is in the doing first without understanding that pleases God, because that means you are just taking Him at His Word. A great example of this principle is when you were little and you asked your parents for something you want, you never tried to take the time to figure how they would do it; you just trust that your parents would do what you asked them. So you just begin to by faith do what they asked you do like your home work or cleaning up your room, because you know your gift was on the way. Why because they loved you. Faith, which is trusting God, is a heart thing, not a head thing.

Galatians 5:6 says, "For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision avails anything, but faith working through love." What cause faith to work is what you know in your heart about others value, if you want to find the treasure in your mate or even in yourself. You need  to use the definition of love that the Bible talks about. It  is not so much this warm fuzzy feeling but is just a commitment to always do good and when we perform this way faithfully the feelings will come. Our feelings can play tricks on us, but there is help. I know there is help because I have been changed by doing what the word says. In John 13:34 Jesus said, "A new commandment I give to you, that you love one another; as I have loved you, that you also love one another." Because it is a commandment from the Lord, He has to equip me to be able to do it. My passion is to help you love in such a way that your love for people will release any treasure that has been buried in them. The whole key to finding a treasure in people is to love people like Jesus loves you.

What We Need & How You Can Help

I have step out on faith on this project from start to finish. To be honest, I laughed when God told me to write a book about relationships. I asked the question, "Why me?" His answer was' "I need someone to be transparent about their ups and downs in their relationships without always trying to come out looking or smelling like a rose." Part of the downs have cost me a whole lot of money and hurt. I know you heard the saying, "It's cheaper to keep her"; they are right about that, and let the church say, "Amen". I have managed to save some money through all my mistakes, but to put the project out, like the Lord said, "With the Spirit of excellence", it"s going to cost upwards of $7000.00.

We have found a great publishing company that has everything we need to get everything done in one place. I have worked on this project for three years and still had to deal with everything else that was coming at me. But the Lord said that now is the time to get it out there because there are so many hurting people who need this word. I could wait and  try to save the money in a couple of years, but it seems like the economy is getting worse. But I believe I can find a few people who will step out on faith with a love gift of $20 or more in order to receive my book in advance and get some wonderful perks for their help. You will be helping to change lives, because it has already started to help the people I have shared these simple principles with. The release date will be the month of March 2014. Become a part of history. Thank you in advance for your support. May God make His face shine upon you.

What Your Help Will Provide

Hard an Paperback Copies of the Book

E-Book format and Distribution

Standard Book Video

Booksellers Return Program

Author Website Setup

Barnes & Noble See inside the Book

Google and Amazon Search Program

Social Media Setup Guide

Press Release-Web-Optimized Edition

                                                  Levels of Reward

                                             @Light of the World Level

-A beautiful Light key ring

                                            @A Treasure Found Level

-An awesome black T-shirt with your own treasure chest on it

                                            @ Shout Your Walls Down Level

-A Copy of the E-Book and Light Key Ring                                        

                                             @Earth Shaker LEVEL

-A Signed Copy of the Paperback Book and a Light Key Ring

                                             @Giant Killer Level

-A Signed Copy of the Hardback Book and a Light Key Ring and a Treasure t-shirt and a personal call thanking you for your gift

                                             @Water Walker Level

-All of the above Perks and your name in the Acknowledgement of the Book

                                             @Lazarus Resurrection Level

-All of the above Perks and a invitation to a Book Signing as well as acknowledgement of your help at the Signing                                                  

                                             @All Things are Possible

-All  of the above Perks and a sentence in the Acknowledgement about You

                                             @He Has Risen Level

-All of the above Perks and I will Speak to You in Person or via Skype with your book club or organization when time permits

                                               @Jesus is Lord Level

-All the above Perks and Dinner for Two at a Restaurant in Baltimore with My Wife and Myself when time permits

We are believing that we will go over the top with your help and any extra funds will be used for giving seminars or air time on radio and TV. This is just the tip of the iceberg to what God wants to do with this ministry. God has been working with us for sixteen years to prepare us for this season, and we are so excited to see what His next move will be.

The Impact

In this time and age we understand that things are tight and you may not be able to help with monetary love gifts, but you can pray for our project. We ask that you share this info via social media as well. And, if you have a project, please let us know so that we can support your vision as well. E-mail us at earlfoundtreasure@aol.com

story:
INTRODUCTION, GOALS and WELCOME

It is very exciting to start on this journey of artistic communion through Indiegogo. Your support and participation will guarantee the life of this book concretely but will also guarantee a collective life both culturally and spiritually.

My goal is also to broaden the scope and touch of poetry. Words are living things that all mankind are gifted with whether they be utilitarian, carefully parsed like precious jewels or issued forth like weaponry or soothing medicine. I would like to build, mine and cultivate this richness and share the joy in it all with others.

The funds given and raised by this campaign will go towards the production and creation of the book's physical first edition from my recently completed manuscript. In addition, a selection of my own photographic pieces will be included to stretch the boundaries of the ordinary poetic publication.

Equally important is the community's moral support and the sharing of this campaign to your friends, colleagues, loved ones, acquaintances, doctors, lawyers, butchers, bakers and candlestick makers.

Any funds over the goal will be used for further production and reproduction costs as well as an audio book version of a portion or all of the book.

Thank you for lighting upon this campaign and for taking the time to read and discover it!

___________________________________

 

““Fits & Starts” by poet Juan-Paolo Perre…is elusive, or fugitive, not in a negative way but rather like...music.”

______________________________________

 

                
  I am sent reeling reckless
 Through the corridors of stars,
 Through the bloodless veins
 Of rural America:
 
Past a clergy of convenience stores
Into the beautiful light of oncoming traffic.
North Platte, Nebraska and frost. Frost.
And the luminescence of jewels
And the mean temperature of souls.
 

Excerpt from "Understanding The Loss of a Daughter On Graduation Night, Five Hours Past"

 
 I am a nomad. Yet I have always had an obsessive need to communicate - to connect. Perhaps one could say that it’s rooted in family history; a mother thing – issues resulting from early years of neglect and an absent father or perhaps better, call it a human thing – issues steeped in as many years and more of being and trying to be a human being: loves and losses, communities and isolation, friendships and jealousies, marginalization, objects, people, failure, celebration and joy.

 I have made my way and continue to make my way through a spectrum of communicative arts: music, dance, song, drama, writing, conducting, directing, speaking and translation. For the longest time this variety was a source of anxiety – I felt I needed to choose. And then I realized that each of these is a shimmering piece of a mosaic that the glue of my soul stretches, bends and holds firmly yet pliantly in place to maintain the integrity of my whole being.

 As a child I wrote for hours. Then singing came as a boy soprano in the cathedrals of Italy then London. And I wrote. Then came the US and the piano, the violin, concerts and more concerts. And still I wrote. By then writing was like breathing, as was singing, playing music and dancing. More music, more concerts, more living: Paris, Moscow, Helsinki, Rome, Tangiers, Marrakech and the deserts of North Africa. Then came acting: Mike Leigh, the Broadway stage and the Hollywood sets of Universal, Paramount and Spielberg: this new, more external kind of drama. Drama, with which you say things you have to say, say things you need to say and don’t say things and yet those things speak loudest of all.

 

 

 And through it all my writing has remained a constant. In the midst of this polymathic timeline poetry revealed itself with full force – the poems of Philip Levine, Pablo Neruda and James Wright moved me and molded me. The beauty of Larry Levis and the soul-stirring duende of Federico Garcia Lorca shook me and I found a home. Each word, the one preceding it and the one following, chosen and conjured like musical notes for some haunting melody or striking chord – complete with silences, accents, conflict and resolution.

 Writing for me is a many-limbed appendage that is music - that sings, that dances or yearns to - that is discursively meditative and inclusive and holds my breath and a million or more of other distinctly, particular breaths. My writing is a collective of breaths swirling in my rib cage informed by a thousand different words, a thousand different notes and a thousand different gestures and movements.

 “FITS & STARTS” is the fruit - the organic product. These poems have issued forth in waves, sometimes in a constant trickle and more often than not, in halting tributaries: in fits of fever and starts of profound inspiration.

Thank you for sharing in this communion.

 - Juan-Paolo Perre

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with your friends and family. Feel free to email, Twitter, Facebook. You can also use indiegogo's share tools to pass this along online!

Feel free to subscribe/like the page on Facebook! Get more updates at http://www.facebook.com/FitsStartsPoems.

And thanks for just taking the time to read this!

 

 

 

 

ABOUT THE AUTHOR

 

 

Born in Siena, Italy and an émigré first to London, England then the US [New York City], Juan-Paolo Perre performs a nifty, quotidian, juggling act of writer, concert violinist, Broadway singer, Hollywood actor (as Adam Alexi-Malle), chef, photographer and translator. He has a bunch of diplomas, degrees, report cards & a few gold stars from the Interlochen Arts Academy, The Juilliard School, the universities of Wisconsin and Maryland, the Université de Paris, the Conservatoire National Supérieur de Paris and Moscow 'Tchaikovsky' National Conservatory.

A recipient of the Harriet Hale Woolley Fellowship, his work has previously appeared in The Cream City Reader, The Red Wheelbarrow, A Delicate Balance and the University of Wisconsin – The Post among others.  Most recently, his other, disembodied voice has been published by Random House Books as narrator of Michelle Moran's bestselling book, "The Second Empress".

___________________________________________________

 “Là, tout n’est qu’ordre et beauté

  Luxe, calme et volupté.”

                             

“L’Invitation au Voyage”

from LES FLEURS DU MAL by Charles BAUDELAIRE

Excerpt from "Understanding The Loss of a Daughter On Graduation Night, Five Hours Past"

 
 I am a nomad. Yet I have always had an obsessive need to communicate - to connect. Perhaps one could say that it’s rooted in family history; a mother thing – issues resulting from early years of neglect and an absent father or perhaps better, call it a human thing – issues steeped in as many years and more of being and trying to be a human being: loves and losses, communities and isolation, friendships and jealousies, marginalization, objects, people, failure, celebration and joy.
 I have made my way and continue to make my way through a spectrum of communicative arts: music, dance, song, drama, writing, conducting, directing, speaking and translation. For the longest time this variety was a source of anxiety – I felt I needed to choose. And then I realized that each of these is a shimmering piece of a mosaic that the glue of my soul stretches, bends and holds firmly yet pliantly in place to maintain the integrity of my whole being.
 As a child I wrote for hours. Then singing came as a boy soprano in the cathedrals of Italy then London. And I wrote. Then came the US and the piano, the violin, concerts and more concerts. And still I wrote. By then writing was like breathing, as was singing, playing music and dancing. More music, more concerts, more living: Paris, Moscow, Helsinki, Rome, Tangiers, Marrakech and the deserts of North Africa. Then came acting: Mike Leigh, the Broadway stage and the Hollywood sets of Universal, Paramount and Spielberg: this new, more external kind of drama. Drama, with which you say things you have to say, say things you need to say and don’t say things and yet those things speak loudest of all.
 

 
 And through it all my writing has remained a constant. In the midst of this polymathic timeline poetry revealed itself with full force – the poems of Philip Levine, Pablo Neruda and James Wright moved me and molded me. The beauty of Larry Levis and the soul-stirring duende of Federico Garcia Lorca shook me and I found a home. Each word, the one preceding it and the one following, chosen and conjured like musical notes for some haunting melody or striking chord – complete with silences, accents, conflict and resolution.
 Writing for me is a many-limbed appendage that is music - that sings, that dances or yearns to - that is discursively meditative and inclusive and holds my breath and a million or more of other distinctly, particular breaths. My writing is a collective of breaths swirling in my rib cage informed by a thousand different words, a thousand different notes and a thousand different gestures and movements.
 “FITS & STARTS” is the fruit - the organic product. These poems have issued forth in waves, sometimes in a constant trickle and more often than not, in halting tributaries: in fits of fever and starts of profound inspiration.
Thank you for sharing in this communion.
 - Juan-Paolo Perre
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Please share this campaign with your friends and family. Feel free to email, Twitter, Facebook. You can also use indiegogo's share tools to pass this along online!
Feel free to subscribe/like the page on Facebook! Get more updates at http://www.facebook.com/FitsStartsPoems.
And thanks for just taking the time to read this!
 
 

 
 
ABOUT THE AUTHOR


 
 
Born in Siena, Italy and an émigré first to London, England then the US [New York City], Juan-Paolo Perre performs a nifty, quotidian, juggling act of writer, concert violinist, Broadway singer, Hollywood actor (as Adam Alexi-Malle), chef, photographer and translator. He has a bunch of diplomas, degrees, report cards & a few gold stars from the Interlochen Arts Academy, The Juilliard School, the universities of Wisconsin and Maryland, the Université de Paris, the Conservatoire National Supérieur de Paris and Moscow 'Tchaikovsky' National Conservatory.
A recipient of the Harriet Hale Woolley Fellowship, his work has previously appeared in The Cream City Reader, The Red Wheelbarrow, A Delicate Balance and the University of Wisconsin – The Post among others.  Most recently, his other, disembodied voice has been published by Random House Books as narrator of Michelle Moran's bestselling book, "The Second Empress".

  Luxe, calme et volupté.” 
                              
“L’Invitation au Voyage” 
from LES FLEURS DU MAL by Charles BAUDELAIRE

story:
The Project

After 3 years of Researching and traveling from Seattle to San Diego and Back and from Seattle to New York and Back, I have had the budget of $400 per trip that last about a month each (going by Ride Share, Trades and Couch surfing). Now I need to complete it so the Book can be published in Early 2016.

My Research

I started researching this book as early as 1989 (even though I didn't know it at the time that I would take a series of trips of self-discovery and test of Self-Reliance, and as a Openly gay Man, a much bigger Test, and going against stereotypes) and 25 years later, I am getting more experiences in traveling on a low budget and going on the roller coaster of staying at Airports and Train Stations to 4 star Hotels. I have Traveled through Canada, the Northern half of the US to Boston and New York, as well as up and down the West Coast. One moving and Humorous story after another.

To finish this book, I need to finish traveling I still need to travel the SW (From Las Vegas to Texas), the Deep South (From Texas to Key West) and the SE (From Atlanta to Washington DC).

Until Now, I have been doing this Out of Pocket, but now I hope to raising my last bit for research and to hire a co-writer to help me organize these stories.

My Closet friends have urged me to write this book, and later I could travel abroad and add those journeys to future books.

ABOUT ME and MY BOOK:

After such amazing and adventurous 3 years art journey I finally decided it's time to turn my photos into unique thing - a beautiful art book. And I need your help to realise the photo book.

My name is Yevgen Romanenko. I am a self-taught professional photographer.

I'm an award winning photographer. I live in Odessa but was born in Budapest. My artistic skills developed quite early, since childhood i has been fascinated with fine art. My adventure with photography began at the end of 2010 and in a short time from a hobby developed into a true passion and a professional occupation. I specialize in beauty, fashion, advertising and fine art nudes photography. My eye for capturing authentic human characteristics and expressions is revealed in a unique, painterly style. I'm known for my perfectionism and my photographs are delicate, yet at the same time bright and vivid.

More about my work: www.romanenko.org

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask me via my email: yevgen and romanenko.org

WHAT I NEED TO PUBLISH THE BOOK ?

My goal is to publish a limited edition book. To do this I need to raise at least 15,000 €. The more money I raise the nicer the book can be. Many details during printing and binding separate a good book from a great book and I want this to be a great book. I am setting a goal of 15,000 € because this is what I think I am capable of raising.

HOW CAN YOU DONATE and GET YOUR OWN BOOK ?

You can donate with your typical credit cards (Visa and Mastercard) or with PayPal account. So it is so easy for everyone :-) The Perks you get for your contribution are on the right side (14 grey rectangles).

WHAT WILL YOU GET FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION ?

While the book itself will be the main goal and the reward for the € 60 and higher levels, big paper prints and beautiful museum archival grand prints up to 100x150cm from my portfolio, personally signed and numbered (edition of 28). Read more about each of these rewards to the right. All books will be sent immediately after publishing the book (during the third quarter of the year 2014).

story:
Greetings EVERYONE,

My name is Joseph (Iosefo) Fa'afiu and some of you may know that I have started to release some of my manuscripts to publishers in New Zealand. I have penned and sent out 3 manuscripts this year to a variety of publishing companies, 2 children's books and 1 short story (based on a true story).

I have found an Australian Publisher who is keen to help my print my book, but it would cost me $855 (NZD) which equals $700 (USD). 

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

We have 30 days to reach our publishing / production cost of $855 (NZD) which equals $700 (USD).

If you would like to support this project but financially backing it, it would help us get our project off the ground and see our work start to fill NZ classrooms throughout New Zealand.

If we do not reach our target, money will automatically return to you account or debit card via Paypal, if we do reach our target - you will receive an invoice via email to confirm you funding support for our work.

This funding will achieve the following:

Image, text and design treatments:

  • 20 allotted images
  • Custom Text & Layout Formatting Service

Production features:

  • Availability of your book in paperback format
  • Availability of your book in e-book format
  • Assignment of ISBN
  • Author Learning Center 12-Month Subscription

Post-publication features:

One Paperback Primary Print Copy & Complimentary Copy((for Author)

Worldwide distribution

Registrations with online booksellers through national distributor

Online book sales and royalty accounting

Book and author webpages in the online bookstore – you control the content

Quarterly royalty payments

Ten (10) bookstubs

Marketing features:

  • 50 bookmarks
  • 50 business cards
  • 50 postcards

The ROYALITIES from this book will go into publishing the other language translations versions of this book.

ABOUT THE BOOK: I AM ME Children's Book (English Edition)

I AM ME is a children’s book that aims to provide a strong sense of identity for the young reader (target age 3 – 7 year olds). The book itself follows the journey of a young kiwi named “KIWI” as he journeys through New Zealand (Aotearoa).

The metaphoric journey through the landscape of New Zealand and meeting the different characters in the stories reminds the reader that some people may look different to you, may also be more talented than you, but one thing should remind.

YOU ARE SPECIAL – YOU ARE YOU

There is no one like you and you should be proud in who you are. As New Zealanders and Kiwis, we should not compare, but be proud of who we are and where we come from.

I AM ME!

(Other editions of this books will be written in Te Reo Maori, Tongan & Samoan)

ABOUT THE AUTHOR [Used for Publishing Companies]

Joseph Iosefo Fa’afiu is a new author / illustrator, who was born in Apia, Samoa and moved with his parents to New Zealand in 1982.

Even though new to the writing world, Joseph has always had a passion for storytelling, and now after many years as a pastor and former teacher support worker, he has decided to branch out and write short stories and children’s books that deal with issues of identity & self esteem, bringing hope into a generation through his writings & storys. 

His 2 children's books are "I AM ME" and "ISLAND LIFE", also Joseph has released a Short story manuscript to NZ publishers called "FORGIVEN" which is based on a true story.

If you feel you can contribute to this project, we would be so BLESSED by your contribution!

Thank you again!
Joseph, Zach and Carne

story:
What I'm Up To

"The country is torn. Families are broken. A corrupted government holds all the power. Fear has filled every nook and cranny, every broken-hearted citizen, and chased the hopes and dreams from the people. In the midst of it all, Jesse and her brother lead a revolution. Just two children, they will have to rebuild their parents' rebel army if they ever hope to justify their deaths. A battle is coming, whether they're ready or not. Their only hope is to be BOLD."


Above is the back-page synopsis for my book, Breaking Shadows: Bold. This book, the first in a series of four, is a Dystopian Christian Speculative Fiction novel for young adults. I have written in this genre for about seven years now. It's what I love, and what I feel God has called me to do. 

I've spent much of my short life as a pastor's daughter, traveling across the country, following wherever God called us. As a family, we moved from Arizona to Maryland in our white Chevy Astro van, giving away everything we owned that wouldn't fit inside. After a year in the DC area, we moved to Philadelphia where we stayed another year for my dad's internship in a large local church. We had thought we would probably return to Arizona and plant a church there, but God had other plans. Suddenly, we were moving to New York City, where we planted a church and spent nearly five years of our lives watching it grow. When my father's health took a bad turn, we moved again to Akron, Ohio, for a less stressful pastoring job.

After a series of unfortunate and heartbreaking events, our family wound up running an ice cream and barbeque shop near downtown Akron. It required unbelievable sacrifice to stay afloat in a bad economy. During these last few years, when I'm not retraining the thoroughbred racehorse given to me, I've been writing. It has been my outlet. It is how I deal with the stress and hardships we, as a family, have had to endure. From the pain of these trials came Bold, a story about boldly enduring whatever may come, fighting forward no matter the cost, because there is always hope in the fact that God's plan is good, and it will be finished... whether you live to see it or not.

I never intended on publishing, but after sharing this story with my family, friends, schoolmates, friends of friends, and others, I was overwhelmed by the encouragement I received and constant requests for publication. I would always laugh and backhand the idea, but it just kept coming up. Finally, after much prayer and thought, discussion with teachers and friends, and what I can only describe as God's hand opening and closing doors, I agreed to take a leap of faith and start talking with publishers. To my shock and amazement, the very first company I contacted, Mascot Books, got back to me about my query within 24 hours. Since then, they have agreed to publish this book with me. It's still hard to believe, as I never dreamed I would make it this far. But, the journey isn't over yet.

What We Need & What You Get

With Mascot Books, I have a huge opportunity for a very small investment. But with my family struggling to survive as small business owners in this sluggish economy, and I myself nothing but a poor college student, even a small investment is more than I have. For the final step in the publication process, I must pay for the first run of prints. This is the only cost passed down to me in this project, but it is a rather hefty one that I am seeking help for funding.

Mascot recommends a first run of 1,000-2,000 books. This is a fairly conservative number and a short enough run that risk is lowered, but high enough that they can really push to distribute it through all of their outlets. With a run of this size, they would be able to push out to Amazon, Barnes & Noble, Books-A-Million, and most of the other large book retailers in the country.

For a first run of books, I will only be paying for the minimal cost of production. Distribution and marketing are covered by Mascot. The anticipated production cost per unit will be approximately $4-$5. This price fluctuates with the number of units ordered. Whatever funding I receive will be solely for purchasing this first run. I have estimated low, knowing it is unlikely I will receive the funding for a full run of 2,000. If my goal is met, I will be able to put out approximately 1,000 books, with anything above my goal being put towards a larger run.

The Impact

This book has come a very long way. My hope is that it can continue to go forward, with God's grace and your help. I truly feel God has called me to write, and to share this book and others with the world. Every writer has a story, one only they can tell. This is mine, and I only pray that it will make it into book form.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand we are all feeling the crunch of hard economic times, especially in an election year. My family and I certainly are or there would be no need for this campaign. In light of this, I know not everyone can help. Just know that every contribution means the world to me as I struggle to obey God's calling for my life. If you would like to help, but do not have the means to give financially, please share this with your friends and family. Help me reach my goal by reaching out to those that may be able to help.

 

Thank you all for your encouragement and support!

story:
Short Summary

Iowans and people interested in Iowa politics are desperate for a legitimate news organization covering government and politics as they apply to them everyday.

The Iowa Statesman plan is to cover all levels of government and politics through a combination of on-staff mobile journalists and strategically placed writers who will provide crowdsourcing coverage.

We will make strategic partnerships along the way with other national media outlets that will expand our reach, and provide the rest of the nation with a better look at the first-in-the-nation caucus state.

By donating to this cause, you will be championing a free press for all of Iowa, while providing a real voice for our shared values. 

What We Need & What You Get

The Iowa Statesman needs the support of your donation to build the infrastructure needed to provide breaking news to Iowans everyday.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're unable to contribute to the campaign, you can help us reach our goal other ways listed below: 

  • Share this campaign with a friend
  • Like us on Facebook and follow us on  twitter

story:
Right now there are hundreds of millions of animals on fur farms, in industrial shearing operations and in line for slaughter so that the fashion industry can profit from their skins, hairs and feathers. With your pre-order or contribution, I will be able to publish Fashion Animals and shed light on an industry that is too often brushed off as something inconsequential. Far from being trivial, fashion has had enormous global impacts on animals and there is a riveting history of everything from extinctions to the use of animals as seductive symbols of power.  With your help, we can get this essential book to people who need to see it.

My name is Joshua Katcher, and I've been waiting my whole life to write this book. I don't just want to report on what currently happens to animals caught up in the fashion industry, but I want to understand why people are so compelled to seek out animal-materials in fashion. No one has written a book dedicated to understanding animals in fashion, and I am so excited to provide this vital resource. 

​

This book can actually change the fashion industry by appealing to designers, creatives, fashion professionals and students. As a fashion designer and entrepreneur, and as an educator and lecturer at some of the top fashion universities in the world, my goal has been to create something that will inspire a major shift from inside the industry. I'm not trying to knock down the walls of the fashion world, I am walking right through the door and checking my coat! Using fascinating, historical images, painstaking research and telling forgotten or hidden stories, this book will not only make the case that it isn’t a matter of how animals are used in the fashion industry, it is a matter that they are used, but to also celebrate visionary innovations that could replace the use of animals altogether. 

I can’t get a book like this into the hands that need it the most without your support. Please pre-order or contribute more and join this effort to rock the fashion industry with a startling, moving and visually stunning book. 

The costs of designing, producing and shipping a big, beautiful, full-color book so extensive in its coverage are extremely high, and that's why we need your help to produce it. 

When you preorder, you'll be one of the first people to have this important book. When you preorder more than one copy, you and your recipients will be drawn in by the imagery, and changed by the content. When you contribute even more, you are investing in a future that challenges the exploitation of animals in fashion.

If we don't reach our goal, this book will not be published and these stories will not be told.

Given the high costs and our high aesthetic standards for design, if we don't meet our goal, the book won't be produced, so your help really does have the chance to make the book happen and thereby help protect animals. This is a book to leave out on your coffee table, to give as a gift, and to use as a strategic conversation piece. This is a book with which to teach, to strategize and to ponder.

With decades of experience in the mainstream, creative industries (from commercial video editing and television production to designing clothing, magazines, art and more) I am in a particularly relevant position of leverage to make a book like this effective and thereby, worth every penny. 

Asking for help publicly is not something that comes easy for people like me: a chronic perfectionist, over-achiever and workaholic. In the fashion industry there is an expectation to appear as if everything is cool and collected, so asking for help shatters the illusion of flawlessness, and becomes some sort of admission of weakness. Regardless, I have swallowed my pride and I am here openly sharing the need for my community to help make this book a real, physical object that can be a tool for changing the world for animals. 

If you're unable to contribute, don't feel bad. You can still help by spreading the word to some folks who might be able to. You can also help promote sales of the book, ask others to get it for you as a gift, or suggest me as a guest speaker or lecturer for you local events, classes or workshops.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools when spreading the word about this campaign!

I'll leave you with the dedication I wrote for this book:

The fashion mausoleum may be spectacular, still and full of soft and exquisite things – but we mustn’t mistake the stillness for peace nor the softness for goodness. Despite the décor, there is little sympathy for fashion’s dead, nor mercy for its doomed. I dedicate this book to every animal whose body has vanished into a silent fashion object. You did not go quietly. You did not go prettily. You did not go willingly.

For the Animals,
Joshua Katcher
story_txt:
Right now there are hundreds of millions of animals on fur farms, in industrial shearing operations and in line for slaughter so that the fashion industry can profit from their skins, hairs and feathers. With your pre-order or contribution, I will be able to publish Fashion Animals and shed light on an industry that is too often brushed off as something inconsequential. Far from being trivial, fashion has had enormous global impacts on animals and there is a riveting history of everything from extinctions to the use of animals as seductive symbols of power.  With your help, we can get this essential book to people who need to see it.

My name is Joshua Katcher, and I've been waiting my whole life to write this book. I don't just want to report on what currently happens to animals caught up in the fashion industry, but I want to understand why people are so compelled to seek out animal-materials in fashion. No one has written a book dedicated to understanding animals in fashion, and I am so excited to provide this vital resource.

story:
Hey Everybody!

Glad you stopped by this page, and nice to virtually meet you. I am Rebecca A. Demarest, award-winning author and book designer and I am happy to announce that pre-orders for the third Ozite book, Ruby Caverns of Oz, are now open! 

Set in the Oz universe, and gathering some of the darker elements of the original novels, the Ozite Cycle follows Thea Gale, a young descendant of Dorothy, as she navigates a world of drugs, arms running, and attempted genocide. Illustrated by Jason Morgado in the manner of the old wood-cut images from Baum's day, the Ozite Cycle is a fantastical and dark view into the lives of humans in Oz.

So, you want your own copy, right?

This campaign is about getting your pre-orders in ahead of the holiday rush and getting some extra awesome swag while you're at it. Various levels will garner you different prizes, including, but not limited to:

  • Postcards
  • A Map of Oz
  • Art cards of the illustrations
  • Earlier volumes (in case you missed Thea of Oz or Zosozo in Oz)
  • And if we reach stretch goals, we'll start getting into button and pin territory!

Risks & Challenges

Our goal is to have Ruby Caverns of Oz finished and in your hands in time for Christmas, but it is also in the editing and illustrating phase now, which means if something goes wrong, it may be delayed. But we will do our best to get it to you as fast as possible! If it is done and ready to ship before the campaign ends, we'll also send it early!

Know somebody who loves Oz?

You should send this pre-order form to them! Even if Oz isn't your thing, there are a lot of people who love it, and odds are you know at least one of them. Pass this campaign along and we'll take care of them like they were our own family.

story:
Short Summary

Just like Many motivated individuals and creative folks who want to accomplish something big and reach a new level in their life. in 2016 I have decided to pursue the education, skill sets, and ideas necessary that could help me achieve my goal of becoming a successful entrepreneur in America.

I knocked on the doors of many successful business owners and South Florida seeking mentorship, and I have volunteered to work alongside many of them for free as I learned from them. As a  result, I have seen a lot of people and I've had many great and memorable experiences. 

After a great time of learning, I realized that even if every one of my mentors were different, they had a lot in common in their character. I have come to the conclusion that, as we build the components in our character that prepare us for success, we all must find what it is in us that makes us unique and what makes us who we are.

About Me

 

  • Member of Toast Masters International.
  • Founder of Better Financial Choices, a company specializing in educating and helping individuals leverage their way towards greater financial success.
  • President of Grace 4, a non-profit organization that focused on helping four categories of people in needs in Haiti; Orphans, Illiterate, Unschooled Adults and Seniors with Tremor.
  • Passionate about helping others achieve greater personal and professional success through personal development.

 

 

What I'm Looking For & What You Get

 

The initial goal of this campaign is to raise $5,000 to cover the cost of

  • Editing,
  • Get A Professional Cover
  • Publishing
  • Marketing
  • Printing and distributing the first 1000 copies of The Art Of Being You.

 

To anyone who contributes to this campaign, you can post this banner on your social media and link to this page to show your support.

​​​​

  • To anyone who makes a contribution of $20 or more in helping me reach $5,000 for this campaign, I will personally mail you a signed copy of this book once it's published. Be sure to DM me @ IG: JimLassin - FB: Jim Lassin
  • I will use any extra contributions to print more copies of the book as well as fund a speaking tour to promote personal growth among young people.

 

The Impact

  • Growing up on the island and moving to a poor community in Miami I have come across a lot of young men and woman that are falling victim to their surroundings and the system. Through the success of that book, I want to approach the leaders of our education system and gain the ability to go and speak to those students in their classroom in order to help them build a better vision for tomorrow.
  • Sometimes when I tell others of my vision, I see that they express doubts or don't see the values in this message. I want to take this opportunity to tell you that, you and someone that you know have a message to share with the world and there are lives that are waiting to be changed by you. We can all do something to make this world a better place.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please help me get the word out and share this campaign with a family member or a friend.
  • The Indiegogo share tools can help you achieve that.

story:
“Being a superhero isn't as cool as it sounds.” At least, that's what my best friend Dax says. Unlike me, he has the ability to manipulate ice, which sounds to me like a nerd's wetdream.

Not only does Felix Wright have an I.Q. of 140, he also has a knack for martial arts and possess strong moral fiber. So why did Dax, his best friend, a lazy slacker with dashing good looks, get super powers instead of him? Begrudgingly, Felix takes it upon himself to whip his buddy into shape, and for good reason: Something's coming. They have to be ready before the other metahumans show up. Because if they aren't, then they won't be prepared for the war to come. A war on a scale humanity has never experienced before. What begins as a light-hearted adventure soon catapults into a fast-paced thrill ride, complete with shocking revelations, double crosses, and super-powered battles.

Who am I?

I'm Cy Cross, a soon graduating senior in highschool. I've always had a fascination with superheroes and a love for writing, and this project is the accumulation of two of my favorite things in the world!

I've been working on the Felix Wright project for around two and a half years, all while balancing out school, a part-time job, being the secretary of a non-profit organization, and most recently a podcast. I have an intense passion for storytelling, one that has gotten me through many long nights, and I couldn't be happier to finally have the opportunity to share Felix's journey with you all. I just need to get the novel edited first!

Why do I need your money?

I asked my editor how much it would cost me to edit A Sidekick's Story. This was his response:

"It's now 99,868 words which is app 399.47 pages. A pretty big book.

Before your discount, the price is $10 ea. for the first 200 pages.
$8.00 per page for the next 200.

Sub total: $2000 + $1600 = $3,600.

15% discount: $540.

Total: $3060."

My editor and I have broken down the 3060 payment into three gaps--1020, 2040, and finally 3060. This campaign is aiming to pay the first fee so my editor and I can start the editing process, but if we can get everything done in one go I would be delighted.

The extra 500 is going to Steven Sookraj, the artist of the series. I am also aiming to give him an extra 200 out of my pockets. As many of you know, he is giving me an amazing deal, as sometimes the cover art for novels alone amount to over 1000 dollars, and I would like to pay him much more if we can exceed over 3560.

Stretch Goals

End Game

Once the editing process has started, there will be a 6 month period where the Steve, the editor and I will work ferociously on finishing the project. Once that 6 month period is over, Felix Wright will be ready for publication, and you'll recieve the novel!

If you can't afford to let go if any cash at the moment, but you still want to help, never underestimate the power of social networking. Share the campaign with your friends and family, and we just might be able to get this all done in a single go! Thanks so much for giving me your attention. If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, don't be afraid to hit me up via Facebook!

story:
Short Summary

I'm Brandy Miller, co-founder of the Elko County Writers.  We started in January of 2013 with five members and a dream: to help other writers connect, make friends, get helpful critiques and useful feedback.  So far, I've been funding the club out of my own money.  We've grown from the original 5 to 23, and we're still growing.  We have writers of all experience levels, from people who have never written anything outside of school to people who are already published authors.  It's a great group and provides a resource that is greatly lacking in rural northeastern Nevada.

However, to get more exposure and more help, we need to become legitimate. We need to become a registered 501(c)(3) organization. We also need to register our name, get registered with the Chamber of Commerce so that we can access their marketing platforms, and we can expand. The problem is that I don't have the personal funds to make that happen.  That's where we need YOUR help. 

What We Need & What You Get

It costs $500 to register as a 501(c)(3) organization, $250 to register for the Chamber of Commerce, and the remaining $500 is seed money for supplies, materials, and other initiatives to help our writers become the best they can be.

Donate $1, receive an Elko County Writer's bookmark to download

Donate $5, get The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers anthology on eBook AND the bookmark

Donate $10, get an "I support Elko County Writers" tote bag AND the Collected Works of the Elko County Writers anthology on ebook AND the bookmark

Donate $15 (includes shipping), get The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers anthology in print format AND the bookmark.

Donate $25 (includes shipping), get an autographed copy of The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers

Donate $50, get an autographed copy of The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers AND a personalized thank-you video from the authors 

Donate $100, get an autographed copy of The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers AND a personalized thank-you video from the authors AND mention on the dedication page

Donate $250, get an autographed copy of The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers AND a personalized thank-you video from the authors AND mention on the dedication page, PLUS an exclusive invitation to our Halloween launch party on October 31st where you can meet the authors in person.

Donate $500, get an autographed copy of The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers AND a personalized thank-you video from the authors AND mention on the dedication page, PLUS an exclusive invitation to our Halloween launch party on October 31st where you can meet the authors in person, PLUS a free spot at a single-day writing seminar to be hosted in November.

Donate $750, get an autographed copy of The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers AND a personalized thank-you video from the authors AND mention on the dedication page, PLUS an exclusive invitation to our Halloween launch party on October 31st where you can meet the authors in person, PLUS a free spot for you and up to 10 friends at a single-day writing seminar to be hosted in November.

Donate $1250, get an autographed copy of The Collected Works of the Elko County Writers AND a personalized thank-you video from the authors AND get your name on the front cover along with a mention on the dedication page, PLUS an exclusive invitation to our Halloween launch party on October 31st where you can meet the authors in person, PLUS a free spot at a single-day writing seminar to be hosted in November

The Impact

Elko County is the biggest county in the United States. It takes 3 hours to drive to the nearest big cities of Twin Falls or Salt Lake City, and 8 hours to get to Las Vegas.  It's hard for writers in Elko County to connect with one another, to bring in the kind of resources that writers in major metropolitan areas often have directly at their fingertips.  We want to help those writers who live right here in this county to get the help they need to become the best writers they can, and we need YOUR help to do it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or other social media sites.  Spread the word about our upcoming anthology.  Join the Elko County Writers (if you live in Elko County) and include a story in our anthology.  There are plenty of things you can do to help make our dream a reality.

story:

story:
***** From now until the 15th, a pledge of $15 or more will get you a WHAT THE TOWN KNEW tote in addition to your tier gifts! *****

WHAT THE TOWN KNEW started as a experimental novel on my blog (TheAbsenteeBlogger.blogspot.com) two years ago. Not sure what type of reaction I would get to the story material, I posted one chapter every week.

The story follows Lizzie Mosher, abused wife of Dale Borden, as she finds freedom. After killing her husband and covering up his death to look like an accident, Lizzie pieces her life together. But in the back of her mind are always the whispers that everyone in the small town of Cloverdale knew the truth. With her new life unraveling around her, Lizzie works harder to ensure her secret remains a secret.

After a few weeks of doing this, I skipped a week and my blog and e-mail was swamped with people asking for the next chapter. There were people, a lot of people, reading Lizzie's story. Her story wrapped up a few months later with quite the following, but no future for sharing her story beyond the blog. I asked how many people would be interested in purchasing a revised version of WHAT THE TOWN KNEW and the response was incredibly positive.

It's taken me almost two years, but I'm finally ready to get Lizzie and her story out to more people. With your help, Lizzie and the rest of Cloverdale will get a makeover and distributed in three formats: Paperback, E-book, and Audible. The money raised will go to pay for professional edits, book cover, and marketing materials to help get the word out.

SPECIFIC TO THIS CAMPAIGN

It's true you could wait until the book comes out and buy it, but then you miss out on all the perks. Such as awesome swag and personalized thank yous from me and Lizzie.

Only by pledging will you get a pin as they are being ordered only for this. No others will be available.

I'm also offering an Early Bird Special. Anyone who pledges $20 (or more) during the first week will receive a keychain and non-woven tote bag in addition to their tier gifts.

ADDITIONALLY - since Lizzie's story deals with domestic abuse and the horrors it causes, I want to do something to help. My second stretch goal will be $2000. If I can make that goal, 5% of my first 6 months sales will go to Domestic Abuse help groups. I have two picked out --- one national and one local. When and if I hit that $2000 mark, I will disclose those groups. Also, everyone who has contributed will be included on the letter accompanying the checks and you will all be notified of the amount sent.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Publishing is a slow process and delays can happen at different levels. Edits come back a little later than expected or proofs need adjustments. I've set the publication date to reflect this and allow myself time to fix errors.

Should something arise that causes a delay in shipping your rewards, you will be notified immediately with the new information.

If you ever have any questions, you're free to contact me at ERMcKeon@gmail.com.
